- Need help? For any technical issues please email us at support@storytoys.com 
- Say hello to us on Facebook: facebook.com/StoryToys 
- Tweet us @StoryToys

82626.name: Your Highness, we should defend! 2
82626.summary: A tower defense game from Amamori Lab.

112738.name: School Grounds
112738.summary: Strange mannequins silently stalk visitors to the school grounds as they piece together the mystery of what is happening at the school.

156011.name: Rounded
156011.summary: Unique ، quite a challenging puzzle game. An experience with wonderful views.

123924.name: Lost In Dungeon
123924.summary: Lost In Dungeon is a randomly generated action shooter with Rogue-like elements. Players will find bizarre treasures, Upgrade weapons and fight off droves of mysterious creatures.

49497.name: Gachasute! Dino Device 2 - Phoenix
49497.summary: Gachasute! Dino Device 2: Phoenix is an Action game, published by Rocket Company, which was released in Japan in 2003.

154820.name: Babol the Walking Box
154820.summary: Begin your adventure with your new friends! Explore the amazing world of box, from the wilderness, desert, to super duper cold snowy mountains!

103800.name: Sarah in the Sky
103800.summary: Sarah in the Sky is a slow-paced casual game with simple mazes and some items for collection. Navigate through the dreamlike world as Sarah, a little girl in search of her own stories.

46887.name: Bugs Bunny
46887.summary: The object of the game is to pick carrots while avoiding the shotgun blast from one Mr. Elmer Fudd. Elmer may not be the shrewdest hunter but he is certainly persistent. Three shots from Elmer’s gun and That’s All Folks!

138793.name: Rollergames
138793.summary:
Is nothing sacred? RollerGames™, the 21st Century's most popular thrill sport, is the latest victim of V.I.P.E.R. (Vicious International Punks and Eternal Renegades). With their greedy eyes on RollerGames' mega prize money, they've corrupted three teams and kidnapped Emerson "Skeeter" Bankhead, the games' beloved commissioner. 
You and your own three teams of righteous skate kings must stop V.I.P.E.R.'s criminal venom from infecting the entire city. So you've got to take the fight to the streets. And the sewers, and the junkyards, and the highways and the jungles . . . through six stages of dastardly traps of doom as you leap over open manholes, careening oil drums and treacherous land-slides. Race around oil slicks and man-eating canines. And avoid ambush by combat copters, bomb-wielding goons and creeps like Captain Meat Hook and the Fish Face. But time is against you. And so are V.I.P.E.R.'s judo masters, skateboard thugs, motorcycle madmen and other assorted sinister scum. 
If your multi-faceted fists can't punch you through, you'll need your special assault body blocks, jump kicks and double whammy slams. 
It's a bone-crunching skate-athon for your life, Skeeter's life, and for the good of RollerGames™. So vanquish V.I.P.E.R. before they melt your ball bearings into bullets.

147658.name: Escape 2088
147658.summary: Escape2088 is an old-school point & click escape room game with modern 3D graphics! Explore a futuristic environment and use your problem-solving skills to set yourself free! Careful observation of the surroundings will help you discover hidden clues, solve logic puzzles and escape in time!

82742.name: The Adventure of a Reticent Girl
82742.summary: A role-playing game from yake-ishi ni mizukake-ron.

78789.name: Tony La Russa Baseball
78789.summary: Tony La Russa Baseball is a baseball game released exclusively for the Sega Mega Drive, and is part of the larger Tony La Russa Baseball series. A small run of the game found its way to Australia.

182880.name: FlickBlocks
182880.summary: Stack blocks on a VR experience inspired by a classic.

67773.name: G.G Series: Conveyor Konpou
67773.summary: A DSi Ware title by Genterprise

182855.name: Surrealista
182855.summary: 8 IMMERSIVE METAPHYSICAL PAINTINGS - A Tribute to Giorgio de Chirico

182874.name: Planet Crafter
182874.summary: A card crafting game where you improve your planets to defend against the invaders

72898.name: Ultima Online: Kingdom Reborn
72898.summary: Lastest expansion to the Ultima Online MMORPG.

3899.name: DreamMix TV World Fighters
3899.summary:
A fledgling television program has been suffering from poor audience approval, and the station that carries the show has informed its producers that they will have to rectify the situation or face inevitable cancellation.

An unorthodox plan is implemented: broadcast a contest pitting various superstars from differing realities in physical combat in order to increase ratings.

176083.name: Ship Graveyard Simulator
176083.summary: Visit the largest ship graveyard in the world. A dozen kilometers of beach filled with wrecks. Hundreds of ships wrecked on the coast. Thousands of tons of steel. Choose the most valuable ship for you and start the adventure. Play as one of the workers during the most dangerous work in the world!

65396.name: Toy Stunt Bike 2
65396.summary: Toy Stunt Bike 2 is an Xbox Live Indie Game.

112820.name: Bloody Mary
112820.summary: What was supposed to be a game turned into a nightmare at the blink of an eye. Madness and fear are lurking in the darkness as your will to survive helps you to move forward. She is already here... She is coming for you... She will find you!

58875.name: Force of Will - TCG
58875.summary: Force of Will Trading Card Game is a new card game that can be played online by various platforms such as UnTapped.in and LackeyCCG.com.

58787.name: Mad Skills BMX
58787.summary: Side scrolling BMX game from Turborilla

155957.name: Puppy Adventure
155957.summary: Puppy Adventure - Top Down View game with role-playing elements and finding puzzles, you in the role of a knight clear the locations of opponents and move through the intricate forests of the kingdom in order to find all the pieces of the puzzle and put them together.

148559.name: Lost Egg 2: Be together
148559.summary: That fragile but brave egg has come back with new powers. A hard action adventure game about the fragility, bravery, and sometimes friendship of raw eggs. Aim for the frying pan at the end of rolling through various stages with sad and touching melody.

152336.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Extraction: Limited Edition
152336.summary: The Limited Edition includes a copy of the Rainbow Six Extraction game as well as digital content, the Obscura Pack, which includes the universal Cephal Black and Cerulean weapon skins along with the Redacted and Anagram charms.

149804.name: Slime Up
149804.summary: Slime Up is an infinite jumper where you jump around the city spraying mucus out of your nostrils and sliming people who get in your way. Rise to the top taking powerful powerups. Just be careful not to fall in the river of slime beneath you...

71228.name: CIA Operative: Solo Missions
71228.summary: Running on the Quake engine CIA Operative: Solo Missions places you in the shoes of Jack Noel as you shoot your way through six locations.

66345.name: Snoopy: The Cool Computer Game
66345.summary: Snoopy: The Cool Computer Game was developed and published by The Edge / Edge Games. Designed for younger players, who control Snoopy and solve puzzles.

21654.name: Resident Evil 5: Desperate Escape
21654.summary: After Jill Valentine is rescued by Chris Redfield, he leaves her to finish his mission. Find out how she made it out on her own, and what role Josh Stone played in her escape.

40254.name: R-Shark
40254.summary: R-Shark is a space themed Shoot 'Em Up developed and published by Dooyong in Korea for the Arcade platform. Many of Dooyongs arcade games were exported to Japan, but R-Shark was their first to only be released in Korea.

62307.name: Heli Brawl
62307.summary: Two helicopters enter, one helicopter leaves in this 2D helicopter...brawler? Shooter?

90888.name: iStunt 2
90888.summary:
Get ready to hit the slopes in the most extreme snowboarding game on the Google Play Store! 
 
Escape deadly buzz saws, keep you balance through gravity shifts and speed boosts, grind your way to victory in this fast paced and insanely addictive snowboarding game!

62126.name: Jissen Pachinko Hisshouhou! CR Sakura Taisen

176277.name: PRTs
176277.summary: A pirate adventure made for lowrez jam 2016

40266.name: Bombjack Twin
40266.summary: Two players at the same time adds a new twist to this platform game. Collect the bombs in order and get a huge bonus.

107518.name: ERTX 2080TI Mining clicker
107518.summary: ERTX 2080TI: Mining clicker - an indie clicker, in which you are waited by a dizzying immersion in the world of mining and expensive video cards..

176260.name: SeaSkulls
176260.summary: Battle your comrades for gold and glory in this frenetic multiplayer game.

176276.name: A Pirate's End
176276.summary: An adventure rogue-like where age is your enemy

153112.name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: New York Central 10a 2-8-2
153112.summary: New York Centrals H10a were built from the early 1900s to as late as the mid 1940s in Canada, although the vast majority came into service prior to 1930.

36288.name: Gold Rush! Classic
36288.summary: Gold Rush! takes you back to the year 1849, when gold was discovered in California. It was certainly one of the most exciting times in American history. Gold Rush! includes the three routes tens of thousands took to the gold regions. Become Jerrod Wilson and experience each trek as you travel from New York to California.

43768.name: Spriggan: Lunar Verse
43768.summary:
Many years ago, an ancient civilization known for their advanced technology once ruled Earth, but were destroyed in the end by their misuse. So, they left messages for later generations in the form of indestructible message plates written in ancient Hebrew, informing them that if they could not find a good use for their creations, they should be destroyed. 
 
Various paramilitaries, national armies, and armed private forces began to secretly search for these "mysterious artifacts" in order to be used for their own good and against their enemies. The ARCAM Corporation and their military arm, the ARCAM Private Army, can stop these forces from destroying themselves with their elite secret agents known as Spriggans.

84485.name: A Little Bit of... Dr. Kawashima's Brain Training Sudoku
84485.summary: Sudoku takes center stage in this edition of the popular Brain Age series. Solve a variety of puzzles at three different skill levels using the touch screen and an intuitive interface. Track your progress by completing three tests and finding out your Brain Age.

108032.name: Drymir Cave under Richmordnom
108032.summary: Drymir Cave under Richmordnom is a hardcore indie project and RPG elements, with a third-person view. Events which unfold in a small area, not far from the native village of the main character.

13274.name: 3-D Voice Chess
13274.summary: Extraordinario juego de Ajedrez en tres Dimensiones realizado integramente en código máquina. Vocaliza en castellano todos los movimientos ejecutados durante la partida.

120777.name: RogueVerse
120777.summary: Rogue-lite role-playing dungeon crawler featuring extremely fast tactical battles and highly competitive leaderboard! Help a party of four heroes descend into the underground city of Shadows to find and engage the Dungeon Lord!

18120.name: Undead vs. Plants
18120.summary: Undead vs. Plants is a ricochet shooter with 150 levels.

79128.name: Russian Front II: The Kursk Campaign
79128.summary: A strategy game similar to an Avalon Hill board game.

11593.name: World of Warcraft: Legion
11593.summary:
World of Warcraft: Legion ushers in an era of unprecedented conflict for the Alliance and the Horde as the Burning Legion’s crusade against creation enters a terrifying new stage.

In this dire new chapter of the Warcraft saga, the demonic Burning Legion has returned, seeking to call forth their fallen leader—the dark titan Sargeras, Ravager of Worlds. As destruction rains across Azeroth, its heroes must seek salvation among the ruins of the Broken Isles, doomed center of ancient night elf civilization and birthplace of myths dating back to the world’s creation. In the face of hopeless odds, they must learn to master mighty Artifacts—legendary weapons that hold the potential to bring down the corrupted armies of the Legion—and strike an infernal pact with the dreaded Demon Hunters of the Illidari . . . accursed followers of the infamous Illidan the Betrayer.

132595.name: Saving Stages
132595.summary: Have you ever watched a rocket launch and land its own booster and thought "Wow I want to do that!" Well look no further, because you came to the right place!

11361.name: Gardening Mama
11361.summary: A spin-off of the Cooking Mama franchise, this game puts Mama in the role of a gardener. Gardening Mama is the first Gardening game for the Nintendo DS.

5070.name: NHL 2K11
5070.summary:
NHL 2K11 is an ice hockey video game, developed by Visual Concepts and published by 2K Sports. 
 
The game was announced on March 3, 2010, as a Wii-exclusive game. It was the first game in the NHL 2K series since NHL 2K7 not to be released on the PlayStation 3, the first since NHL 2K6 not to be released on the Xbox 360, the first since NHL 2K3 to not be released on the PlayStation 2, and the last game in the NHL 2K series to be released on the Wii, as the next entry in the series is released only on iOS and Android devices. Take-Two chairman Strauss Zelnick said that "As far as NHL, we're taking a year off on PS3 and Xbox 360 to refine, redesign and re-think". 
 
Then Vancouver Canucks forward Ryan Kesler is the cover athlete for NHL 2K11.

91058.name: Addition Flash Cards Math Help Quiz Learning Games

91387.name: Kenka Bancho
91387.summary: The first game in the Kenka Bancho series of Japanese brawlers.

40085.name: Land Sea Air Squad
40085.summary: Land Sea Air Squad is a 2D top-down shooter, with similar gameplay like Ikari Warriors (and controls from Commando). The player is a soldier, who must defeat an enemy army. As in Ikari Warriors, the player can control vehicles - tanks, helicopters and boats. He has a gun with unlimited ammo and grenades. At the end of each level, the player must beat a heavily armed vehicle.

32493.name: Reverence: The Ultimate Combat Experience
32493.summary:
Experience real sword fighting in Reverence.

With total control over your body, you carve your own destiny in this first and third person, multiplayer, combat experience. With the Muscle Memory System you can intuitively control all your limbs and even tweak your muscle memory to create a unique style. To get the edge necessary to defeat a worthy opponent, you can override your muscle memory to make adjustments to your strikes in real time. When we have the autonomy to craft the execution of an individual strike when we see an opening a deeper level of immersion unfolds. 

Reverence supports mouse, keyboard, gamepad, and virtual reality devices.

95502.name: The Labyrinth Plus! Edition
95502.summary: The Labyrinth Plus! Edition is a computer game for Windows XP. It consists of a 3-D maze puzzle in which the objective of the game is to get a ball to the end of a maze, using dots on the board to guide the player around the obstacles.

143686.name: Hero Among Us
143686.summary: Hero Among Us is a strategy/manager game were you create your own super hero, define where in the globe he/she will appear and manage how the world reacts to your actions and decisions.

80411.name: Nocturne
80411.summary: A text adventure game generated with the Incentive Graphic Adventure Creator and published by Alpha-Omega Software for the Amstrad CPC.

45076.name: Jimmy Johnson's VR Football '98
45076.summary:
As Interplay's first PlayStation football game under the VR Sports label, Jimmy Johnson's VR Football '98 offers both NFL and NFLPA licenses for real teams and players. Choose from 30 NFL teams with rosters reflecting the 1997 season, five of the greatest teams from the '70s, five from the '80s, five from the '60s, or five All-Pro Teams from 1996 and 1997. 
 
You can also create up to four preseason teams (plus one season team) and stock them with up to forty created players! The game features a Practice Mode, Preseason (which is an exhibition game), New Season and a Play Editor, allowing you to create your own offensive plays and save them to memory card (up to 24 plays can be saved for each block of space). 
 
Season progress can be resumed through passwords or via memory card, which offers you a choice between a regular or advanced memory card season. Regular means you can trade and create players, but the trades will be automatic and the created players always appear on your team. The advanced option lets you play the role of General Manager, including signing free agents (by bidding on them), organizing trade offers (which can be rejected) or creating players to add to the free agency pool.

37350.name: Uchuu Senkan Yamato
37350.summary: Uchuu Senkan Yamato is a Strategy game, developed by Tom Create and published by Bandai Visual, which was released in Japan in 2001.

85675.name: Prometheus
85675.summary: PROMΞTHΞUS is a singleplayer/cooperative game that takes place in the distant future, where humanity has taken an endeavor to a distant sci-fi planet, known as Orpheus.

161623.name: Battle In The City
161623.summary: Battle in the city is a top-down shooter inspired by the classic '80s. The objective is to defend your base and face your enemies in 35 different levels, where each map contains different types of terrain and objectives.

9213.name: Professional Lumberjack 2015
9213.summary: Face the hard work of real lumberjacks as you control and operate various small and large machinery at your disposal.  From huge Feller Buncher and Harvesters that debranch and cut up the trunks, to tractors, cranes, trucks and trailers for the transportation of the chopped logs. In your own expandable mill you will be able to produce different goods from the raw material and sell your product output for profit.

86665.name: Color Block Game
86665.summary: It is a simple iOS game the user can play within couple minutes. The mission of the game is to stack up the blocks as high as you can, and keep challenging your self to make new records.

169474.name: Galvatia
169474.summary: Galvatia is a PC game where you are an invisible conservationist for animals. It contains 5-enviroments such as a European meadow, a mixed forest, an American rainforest, an African savannah and an ocean.

114149.name: Plunder Kings
114149.summary:
How good do you think you are?
Plunder Kings takes the classic arcade shoot'em ups and adds a serious twist. You can wager your loot on how you think you can fly.
The rogue-like shoot'em up you were looking for! Play as one of three different space pirates with unique ships and abilities. Pair them with special drones for completely unique battle combinations.
Take your new found powers to Avalon and steal EVERYTHING that isn't bolted down. When that isn't enough gamble your winnings on future plays to earn ALL of the space billions!

61716.name: Bit Brawlers
61716.summary: Bit Brawlers is a 4-player fighting game that heavily relies on user-generated content.

39766.name: Battlefish: Free Zombie Games
39766.summary:
A tower defense zombie games with shooting elements set between the battle between man vs fish zombies. Battlefish features stupidly cute fish zombies, baby fish zombies, sea monsters, clan fish, Hercules fish, jelly fish, dragon fish, baby sea monsters, fish giants, strategy, and chaos.   
   
In the Battlefish free zombie games no WiFi needed at all. But, for extra features like battling other players for valuable resources you need to join the Clan Fish! Engage in, enjoy, and rule the zombie games online too in Clan Fish section!

44238.name: Infantry
44238.summary: Drop down on Damocles, the war ridden alien planet, and fight to the death in our action packed shooter Infantry. Infantry puts you right into the action, giving you a multitude of classes, weapons, game modes and customization to wage war against your enemies in an online multiplayer environment.

81850.name: Stickman Safe and Destroy
81850.summary: Stickman Safe and Destroy is an epic game where you need to use different methods to destroy the stickman. Collect as many points as possible and open up more sophisticated ways and zones of destruction.

18203.name: Killer Shark
18203.summary: Killer Shark is a first-person light-gun shooter arcade game that was published by Sega in 1972. The objective of the game is for the player is to repeatedly shoot the approaching sharks. The arcade received moderate success, but gained considerable notoriety after it was featured in the 1975 movie Jaws, seen being played by a gamer at a local beachside arcade in the community of Amity Island. This bit of levity left a major impression on audiences and made Killer Shark the first, and most famous shark arcade game ever.

789.name: MiG Alley
789.summary: MiG Alley is a combat flight simulation set in Northwestern Korea, specifically in MiG Alley.

98125.name: Shirouto Yanmama, Kosatsu AV Debut: Mitena, Onna wa Dokyou Da ze!

63957.name: Norimono Banzai!! - Kuruma Daishūgō!!
63957.summary: Norimono Banzai!! - Kuruma Daishūgō!! for the Playdia

127594.name: Slippery Sausage
127594.summary: Slippery Sausage is a frantic arcade game where a sentient sausage is out to stop inanimate objects inhabited by mischievous alien spirits! Master handling your sausage, and defeat a wide variety of enemies across 50 levels!

138511.name: Projectile Dysfunction
138511.summary: Have you ever said to yourself "This FPS game is really good, but you know what would really put it over the top? If my gun barrel would flap around like a nude skydiving man."? Well, we got your back; It's a regular multiplayer FPS, but all the guns are floppy.

119396.name: Magic of Endoria
119396.summary:
The strategy-game Magic of Endoria takes place in the fantasy kingdom Endoria. Aeons ago the gods of Endoria were disgusted by the badness in the world and morphed themselves into crystal splinters and retreated into the underworld. Who gets all these splinters becomes the master of Endoria. Now two rival arch mages got aware of this myth and go on the search. You are one of them. 
 
Of course you have to dig deep into the underground to find them. Your responsibility lies in the building. managing and defending of mines. To achieve this you hire employees with different professions: Craftsmen, researchers, mine workers, hauliers and warriors. These people want to see money for their work and they improve their abilities when they become experienced. 
 
During the game you dig new alleys, equip them with traps, research new tools and fight against enemy troops to conquer their alleys. Later you have mutated creatures to your disposal. You spend most of your time on a map with hexagonal fields. There you issue orders and set the routes of your employees. 
 
The in 1995 released CD-ROM version features speech, new background music and an online help. Additionally there is a "light" version of the game which tones down the complexity. 
 
The PC version of Magic Endoria differs from the Commodore 64 version released the previous year in that it is real time instead of turn based.

176256.name: The Elevator Game
176256.summary: Do you know the elevator game?

92058.name: Club Penguin: Game Day!
92058.summary: It's Game Day! Are you ready for the challenge? Play in the first ever Club Penguin island-wide Game Day challenge only on Wii console. Create your own penguin, join a team and compete against other penguin teams in Java Jump, Sled & Slide, Sumo Smash, Fast Freeze and more. Compete to see who is the best team once and for all!

59530.name: American Civil War: The Blue and the Gray
59530.summary: American Civil War: The Blue and the Gray is a historical strategy game set during the American Civil War.

42744.name: Soreyuke Burunyan-Man Portable - Torimodose Ai to Seigi to Kibou no Tsunyakan
42744.summary: Soreyuke! BurunyanMan Portable is an Action game, developed and published by Alchemist, which was released in Japan in 2012.

56668.name: Steel Assault
56668.summary: Punch, whip, and zipline your way through a post-apocalyptic America in this retro-style action platformer! Play as Taro Takahashi, a resistance soldier on a revenge mission against the dictator who lords over the ashes.

79292.name: Macross 30: Voices across the Galaxy
79292.summary: Game celebrating the 30th anniversary of the Macross series.

6831.name: Jewelpet: Magical Dance in Style Deco!

22915.name: Top Gun: Hard Lock
22915.summary: Top Gun: Hard Lock was released in March 2012 for Xbox 360, Microsoft Windows, and PlayStation 3, by 505 Games and Paramount Interactive. The player takes the role of a pilot named Lance "Spider" Webb, who graduated from Top Gun under the auspices of Pete "Maverick" Mitchell. As Spider, the player engages in missions during a blockade of a new terrorist regime (a former US ally who had a coup) in the Persian Gulf. The player flies missions from USS McKinley in the Gulf, which involve shooting down hostile planes and destroying missile boats. Eventually, the player conducts bombing runs over enemy camps and bunkers, and the last mission involves assisting NATO ground forces, an airfield, and special forces troops in attacking the enemy forces.

120585.name: Survival or die
120585.summary: SURVIVAL or DIE - This is a roguelike, pixel-style action shooter. A charming game, gloomy but at the same time amusing, will appeal to fans of the genre at first sight!

2336.name: Mario Party 9
2336.summary:
Grab your friends and family and captain the crew to victory!

The party is back and bigger than ever in the Mario Party™ 9 game for Wii, featuring all-new ways to play! For the first time in the franchise, boss battles crash the party and challenge players to compete to defeat a common enemy. In addition, players now travel across stages together in a vehicle towards a common goal - overcoming obstacles, battling bosses, and collecting Mini Stars stolen by Bowser™ and his minions. Featuring 80 new minigames, adventurous new stages, and all-new ways to play that blend cooperative and competitive action for up to four players*, Mario Party 9 is the perfect way to get the party started.

-For the first time in the Mario Party franchise, each stage culminates in a Boss Battle. Collectively, players must combine their strength to defeat classic foes such as Bowser™ and King Boo while still playing competitively to boost their own individual scores.

-In another first for the series, players ride across stages together in special vehicles. Players take turns as Captain of the vehicle by hitting Dice Blocks to move the party forward, hoping to land on lucky spaces. The vehicles also help to streamline game play and keep everyone involved in the action.

-Unique Captain Events on each stage give players a new way to change the shape of the game.

-In Mario Party 9, each themed stage has a clear destination point but with multiple paths along the way, so no two games will play the same. From Toad Road to Boo’s Horror Castle, players will encounter a wide variety of familiar Mario franchise elements in new environments that can be enjoyed solo or with friends.

-Includes 80 outrageous new minigames that find players making pizzas, escaping haunted mansions, and racing snowmobiles.

-No time to play through an entire stage? New minigame modes let players enjoy the action in smaller chunks of time. They can hone their skills at any minigame in Free Play mode or try the Extras mode that includes Goomba Bowling and the puzzle-based Castle Clearout.

-Every time they play, players can earn Party Points that are used to unlock special items and features.

* Additional accessories are required for multiplayer game play and are sold separately.

156594.name: Peasants
156594.summary: A city builder with a twist - Putting the focus of the game on the peasants who live and grow in your community. Cater for them, deal with their shortcomings and just maybe they will thrive.

85064.name: Dangerous Road
85064.summary: Cross a busy road avoiding the traffic, dart across train lines missing the speeding trains and leap across gushing rivers on moving logs. One mistake and it's game over.

176261.name: Want To Hear a Scary Story?
176261.summary: Take up the mantle of a Slasher villain, hack and chop your way through victims to get revenge.

167507.name: Karvaros
167507.summary: A Souls-like that will have you coming back again and again. Great multiplayer with survival aspects and procedural map generation to always keep you on your toes. Rewarding progression through Factions and Fun Boss Fights in this ever changing Dark Souls inspired game.

83310.name: Moe Moe 2-Ji Daisenryaku 3
83310.summary: The third numbered entry in Daisenryaku's anime girls spin-off.

112530.name: Shinseiki GPX Cyber Formula SIN VIER
112530.summary: Master a 700 km/h monster machine! Super beautiful effect! Include a VR mode! Make your best lap with the transformation system and the multi-step boost, just like in the "Future GPX Cyber Formula" anime! Become the next world champion!

122298.name: Throne Quest Deluxe
122298.summary: Throne Quest Deluxe is a seem-less open-world Action Role Playing Game (ARPG). Delve into an adventurous world full of dungeons and crypts, fighting many types of vicious monsters and search for huge amounts of loot. Change between 12 classes throwing your axes, fire, harps and even a djenty-guitar in fast-paced combat whilst gulping potions and collecting drops to level-up and become a champion. Explore your way through the dangers of the lands on an epic quest to reach the central castle- to claim the Throne held by a demon boss.

192447.name: MacShot
192447.summary: Adventure retro game for Pc. The best of old games!

192446.name: Legacy Quest 2
192446.summary: Legacy Quest 2 is a 2D side-scrolling platform game. Jump and slide your way through challenging and fun levels to collect gemstones, while avoiding obstacles and enemies.

59049.name: Josou Gal Bitch Gakuen: Half Musume Judy no Yuuwaku
59049.summary: A visual novel from Gal Prince.

79575.name: Justin Bieber Revenge
79575.summary: Justin Bieber Revenge is a game in the Tap Tap Franchise for iPhone featuring Justin Bieber songs.

192457.name: Azrael
192457.summary: Azrael is a first-person Detective/Horror Game in which you play as a detective capable of reliving crime scenes. Explore different environments, find clues and try to find out who is the serial killer in a murder case among a group of friends.

192466.name: Hidden World Top-Down 3D
192466.summary: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

192449.name: 69 Estera Hot
192449.summary: 69 Estera Hot - Memory game with visual novel elements in fantasy style. Estera is the lustful owner of the old castle. She was alone for a very long time and but finally she waited for you.

27789.name: PUBG: BATTLEGROUNDS
27789.summary: PUBG: BATTLEGROUNDS is a battle royale shooter that pits 100 players against each other in a struggle for survival. Gather supplies and outwit your opponents to become the last person standing.

32188.name: Plates
32188.summary: Plates is a minimalist puzzle game. Experiment and explore to progress through over 50 inventive levels.

90058.name: Legend's World
90058.summary:
Legend's World takes place at the same time as the The Adventures of a Legend. Now they have a limited time, the superior forces decided to launch new challenges... Survival is at stake. 
 
Many years ago in distant lands, the secrets of the incidents, which gave rise the appearance of strange creatures and the changing of the world into a world of fantasies and adventures, were guarded by The Ancients and this marks the beginning of the First Era. Over the years, the creatures have become more dangerous, the adventures have become very risky and the changes in the world occurred in a bad way. 
Today, twenty-one years later, the last ancient decided to challenge and confront the world and its challenges with the help of the last heroes. 
 
Survival Mode: 
Stay alive until time runs out. 
 
Next updates: 
New itens, characters and missions. 
 
Collect as many fragments and coins as you can to buy extra jumps and upgrades for your heroes. New attributes and items are coming. You should continue collecting coins to use as soon as new attributes become available.

147813.name: Laid-Back Camp: Virtual - Fumoto Campsite
147813.summary: Experience Laid-Back Camp in 3D! Together, Rin (you!) and Nadeshiko embark on a new camping adventure at the Fumoto Campsite, taking pictures and trying lots of delicious food. About the Game Nadeshiko, Rin & co. encounter a variety of unique situations.

176273.name: Sword Of Power
176273.summary: Charge your sword, kill them all!

176251.name: Error: Slasher Alert
176251.summary: There is something on your computer, and it's NOT a virus.

163591.name: Tiger Fighter 1931: MP049
163591.summary: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. The DLC include map pack 049.

69363.name: Ise Shima Mystery Annai: Itsuwari no Kuro Shinju
69363.summary: Ise Shima Mystery Annai: Itsuwari no Kuro Shinju is a retro-style adventure game.

182881.name: By God Your Anger is Beautiful
182881.summary: FEVER FEAsT FOLLOW-THRU to mantras for breakfast., it's fuck you for lunch

46748.name: Into Oblivion
46748.summary:
The story is set in the aftermath of the destruction of an evil computer. Only its servants remain, from the planet Nonterraqueous, a location used by programmer Steven Curtis in the prequels Nonterraqueous (1985) and Soul of a Robot (1985). The player's objective is to find a safe planet amongst the 42 in the system. 
 
The player controls a small vehicle, a "Mk II Seeker", which allows for exploration of the various screens. Joystick or keyboard can be used. The player is supplied with a laser beam to destroy various hazardous lifeforms, and nine lives. Each screen has a group of three enemies that follow different movement patterns. Some screens contain a spacecraft that transports the player to another planet. 
 
Amstrad Action gave Into Oblivion an overall rating of 70%, highlighting the large number of screens and the exploration and mapping required to find the safe planet. However, the gameplay was criticized for the lack of excitement from obstacles and enemies.

62398.name: Total Pinball 3D
62398.summary: A mid-90s pinball game featuring four tables: Kick Off, Jail Break, Tarantula and Jackpot

2223.name: Torin's Passage
2223.summary: Torin's Passage is a game for children, but like all really good games, books, and movies with similar target audience it also has that knowing wink towards older audience, and the best thing about this game is that it "winks" a lot.

182868.name: Fateful Dealings
182868.summary: A systems driven card RPG where you play as one of the recently deceased.

21666.name: Resident Evil 5: Lost in Nightmares
21666.summary:
Lost in Nightmares is the first story-based DLC for Resident Evil 5, set during a previous mission hinted at in flashback from that game. It is about 1 hour in length, depending on the difficulty, and experienced players can beat it in under 30 minutes. It is, all together, one chapter filled with classic puzzles and moments that will take players back to the first Resident Evil. It also features a scoreboard with worldwide rankings based on performance in the scenario as well as collection items. 

This extra chapter is not accessible from the start of the game. It becomes unlocked after Chapter 3-1, the Marshlands, has been completed in the core campaign.

176255.name: This is hard for me
176255.summary: This is so we all feel less alone.

38866.name: Crumble Zone HD
38866.summary:
Crumble Zone is an action-packed arcade game about a little, green alien who works hard just to fight for his tiny planet. The thing is to shoot down asteroids while rotating around a planet to get the highest score possible. 
 
Crash comets! Blow up meteoroids! Shatter and smash menacing asteroids with powerful weapons! Use a tremendous wave of explosions. Hurl missiles until nothing remains. Save the planet for as long as you can! Earn diamonds and precious gems to unlock special weapons!

29422.name: Throne of Lies: Medieval Politics
29422.summary: The 3D online multiplayer game of social deduction and mischief, inspired by medieval politics and the Werewolf/Mafia (1986) genre. Gather 'round the tabletop, uniting allies of the realm with strategy to distinguish friend from foe.

110505.name: Puzzle Plunder
110505.summary: Puzzle Plunder is a Pirate themed match 3 game with stat building elements. Connect and match the icons to overcome obstacles as you sail the vast ocean in search of loot.

182870.name: Nethercard Kingdom
182870.summary: Build your deck, send troops in to battle and support them to victory in real-time lighthearted strategic battles!

32428.name: Townsmen
32428.summary: From humble backwater to medieval metropolis - build the city of your dreams!

38941.name: Teeny Titans: Teen Titans Go!
38941.summary:
In Teeny Titans, Go! you will join Robin for a figure battling RPG of epic proportions.
Assemble your squad and face off in 3-on-3 battles! Bust out super moves in real time with the battle bar. Switch between your heroes to launch awesome attacks and take down your opponents.

97408.name: The New Adventures of Moomin: The Great Autumn Party

125313.name: Invasion Deutschland
125313.summary: Alien monsters fall over Germany and have taken over the rule. Buildings throughout Germany are besieged by them. They neither shy away from the Brandenburg Gate nor from the Hofbräuhaus and Marienplatz. With the help of a cranky scientist and his assistant, the player gets involved with the rogues. Do not miss a chance to destroy your opponent with the provided weapons. Countless puzzles wait to be solved by you. With Invasion Germany, the idea of the otherwise bloodthirsty first-person shooter was enriched by a humorous version.

152575.name: Mousey Mick
152575.summary: Mousey Mick is a 2D Platformer developed by Jackrifleman. In Mousey Mick, you run, jump, wall-jump, dodge and dash your way through various worlds and their stages.

78473.name: Akogare Girls Collection: Suteki ni Nurse Days
78473.summary: Akogare Girls Collection: Suteki ni Nurse Days is an Adventure game, developed by Open Sesame and published by Creative Core, which was released in Japan in 2009.

49058.name: Turn and Burn: The F-14 Dogfight Simulator
49058.summary: Turn and Burn: The F-14 Dogfight Simulator is a Simulation game, developed by Imagineering Inc and published by Absolute Entertainment, which was released in 1992.

60476.name: Anekouji Naoko to Gin'iro no Shinigami

39659.name: Dragon Blaze
39659.summary: Dragon Blaze is a vertical scrolling shoot 'em up arcade game released in 2000 by Psikyo. It was ported in 2004 to the PlayStation 2 as part of the Psikyo Shooting Collection Vol. 3:Sol Divide & Dragon Blaze compilation. The game was later also released on its own for the PS2 in Europe by 505 Games.

66559.name: The Legend of Egypt
66559.summary: The Legend of Egypt is a strategy and puzzle game

150461.name: Cut Them Up
150461.summary: When life gives you endless hordes of infernal enemies, make a mess !

75327.name: Keep Rollin!
75327.summary: Funny arcade game with original gameplay. Continue to move and try not to crash into dangerous obstacles!

56821.name: Two Bot's Journey
56821.summary: Two Bot's Journey is a puzzle/platformer game.

57441.name: Little Invasion Tales
57441.summary: Little Invasion Tales is a town management strategy game from The Tiniest Shark.

110035.name: Reality Clash: AR Combat Game
110035.summary:
Reality Clash is a free-to-play augmented reality combat game available on iOS and Android. 
 
Players challenge bots or other players and then enter a virtual battlefield by physically stepping into an augmented reality Portal. Winning these battles will unlock rewards which can be used to unlock and build better weaponry. 
 
Inside the virtual battlefield (also known as 'The Sim') player movement and height is tracked, so if a player crouches down - their in-game Avatar will crouch. This provides a unique kind of FPS mobile gameplay as players must move around and use the virtual environment to their advantage. 
 
Players can also improve their skills in a variety of training modes.

176254.name: A Little Bus Stop
176254.summary: A small game about a couple waiting at a bus stop, made over the course of about 3 or 4 days.

176252.name: Jumbled manifesto
176252.summary: A jumbled up manifesto. Dive in and dig out some of the thoughts that I sometimes think!

96267.name: MLB 9 Innings 18
96267.summary:
"MLB 9 Innings 18 is the newest iteration of the 9 Innings series, featuring all 30 MLB teams and rosters. 
Collect your favorite players and put them to the test. 
This is an authentic MLB experience on mobile that you’ve never seen before."

68840.name: 新仙劍奇俠傳 Sword and Fairy
68840.summary: *** This game is only available in Chinese language ***

93117.name: Xiao Ao Jiang Hu 2: Wu Yue Jian Pai

176250.name: Turrim 3D
176250.summary: A First Person Slasher Where You Eat Hearts

70854.name: Witch!
70854.summary: A Point And Click Adventure Game created by Joel Page as part of the Reality-On-The-Norm project.

60670.name: The Dreamland Chronicles: Freedom Ridge
60670.summary: A unofficial 3D remake of X-COM by the original developers, cancelled in 2001.

42085.name: Bikkuri Man World
42085.summary: Despite being Hudson’s Vol.2, this was in fact released almost a month before The Kung Fu. It’s a conversion of what most people know as Wonder Boy in Monster Land, and it’s as perfect a conversion as you’re likely to get. This game takes a different pace from the first Wonder Boy game, being more of an adventure with a slower pace and more strategy. You start the game with barely a thread on and are given a sword by some wise looking dude who lives in a tree - so far so good. It is then your task to travel through the various platform-based levels defeating monsters and evil bosses along the way. Each enemy you kill leaves behind a coin or money bag (these are also at various hidden locations if you jump at the right spot) and shops will offer you armour, shields, weaponry and go-faster shoes. You can also pop into a bar and top up your energy if you can afford it. Levels are time limited (shown by an egg-timer on the left) so you need to be quick, or energy is taken away from your heart meter.

176311.name: Why does he want me dead

105707.name: One person story
105707.summary: Can the game be a symbol of the life? Friends help, doors stop our movement, we must think and resolve difficulties. Is it a game or life?

69653.name: Arcade Archives: Crazy Climber
69653.summary: Crazy Climber is an action arcade game produced by Nichibutsu in 1980. Players control the right hand and left hand of the twin lever, to overcome various obstacles, to climb aiming the top of the skyscraper.

20204.name: SCP-087-B
20204.summary: SCP-087-B is a small experimental horror game loosely based on SCP-087.

51739.name: Lycah
51739.summary: Lycah - The Enchantress is an episodic saga from the team behind the Thorne series that puts you in the role of Lycah, a young woman troubled by her past.

63019.name: ExaSkeleton
63019.summary: ExaSkeleton is an Action game, published by Kiki, which was released in Japan.

106622.name: Dabwoman: When The Dab Isn't sexist
106622.summary: What is Dabwoman? Do I really need to explain this? I guess so, because I need a description. Well, Dabwoman is the best super hero video game ever made, want to argue on that? Alright, we are going to meet behind the school in 2 hours. You want to know the story? Alright, well it's a woman, and she eats a laundry pod for no reason what so ever, and guess what? She becomes a super hero, you gotta admit that's pretty dope. I'm not going to tell you the whole story, so just play the game man. It's like a movie, but interactive, go make some popcorn and play it, if you don't play it.. then you are a bully. Being a bully is bad.

72399.name: Lumberjack VR
72399.summary: Experience the thrilling life of a Lumberjack in virtual reality with Lumberjack VR, an arcade action game for the HTC Vive. Fight your way through waves of logs, lumber and bombs with nothing but an axe in your hand.

54294.name: The Secret Legacy – A Kate Brooks Adventure

49609.name: Gegege no Kitarou: Kiki Ippatsu! Youkai Rettou
49609.summary: Gegege no Kitarou: Kiki Ippatsu! Youkai Rettou is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2003.

113610.name: Pixel Devil and the Broken Cartridge
113610.summary: Classic platformer in the style of Pixel-art. The main character goes to the world of 8-bit games to save his girlfriend. Help him to find new abilities and find out who is behind the abduction of the girl.

36463.name: Employee Recycling Center
36463.summary: Abandoned by your co-workers after a terrible accident in the factory, you are trapped. Interact with your environment, solve puzzles and unlock up to 500 achievements in this new adventure for PC and Virtual Reality Headsets.

98896.name: Neuro
98896.summary: Neuro - is a short but very beautiful and dynamic platformer.

31345.name: VR Journey
31345.summary: Welcome to the Astral! You are here to defend the portal! Use your determination and reaction skills to repel the demons that want to invade our world! Slow down the time, defeat enemies by meteorite rains and make them eat your arrows!

155299.name: The Abnormal Place
155299.summary: The Abnormal Place is a game about Abigail, a young woman who has lost her voice and has found herself in a strange resort and hotel inhabited by monsters. Abigail must recover her voice and navigate through the hostile world or she'll be forever trapped.

180386.name: Snowfall
180386.summary: A 2D adventure game where you play as a small boy trying to rescue his dog from the beings that live in the woods.

59176.name: Raiders Sphere 4th
59176.summary: In the distant future, humanity has turned Venus into a livable environment. However, not all is well on Venusian soil as political intrigue pushes the way to help a young girl, the ace pilot known as Sonic Venus, to find the whereabouts of her missing father.

163601.name: Tiger Fighter 1931: MP040
163601.summary: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. The DLC include map pack 040.

63698.name: Clan Lord
63698.summary: A top-down 2D MMO with a simple bump to attack interface. Has regular updates every three weeks. The first graphical MMO for Macintosh, now also for PC.

94744.name: beatmania complete MIX
94744.summary:
beatmania completeMIX is a rhythm game developed by Konami. It is the fourth game in the beatmania series and is part of the BEMANI franchise. 
 
The game is played with a controller with one turn table and 5 keys, three white and two black. On the screen you will see bars moving from the top to bottom in columns representing each of the keys and the turntable. When the bars reach the judgement line it is time to scratch. 
 
Even though the game is based on the beatmania 3rdMIX engine, it does not feature a combo count. It is the first game in the series to show song titles on the song select and not just the genres. The flashing great judgement is introduced, which requires better precision to obtain over the normal great judgement. 
 
INTERNET RANKING functionality is implemented. After a course has been completed an INTERNET RANKING code was given, which could be entered on Konamis online leaderboards. 
 
beatmania completeMIX is a compilation mix containing the full song lists from beatmania - beatmania 3rdMIX. Only 4 new songs are added to the game, 2 of which are english versions of earlier songs. The total number of songs available in the game is 44.

62772.name: Don't Touch My Teddy Bear
62772.summary: A mobile game where players save a teddy bear from destruction by animals!

65110.name: DeadEnd: Cerebral Vortex
65110.summary: DeadEnd: Cerebral Vortex is a labyrinth game by Membranos. As the player you explore your character's subconscious, slowly recovering your soul across 20 levels.

63804.name: Slender Man's Shadow
63804.summary: A compilation of all the Slender Man's Shadow maps.

69056.name: Disney Princess Worlds of Enchantment
69056.summary: Disney Princess Worlds of Enchantment is a game for the Leapster.

176313.name: Rain reader
176313.summary: A randomized choice game about struggle

42609.name: Hyper V-Ball
42609.summary: A volleyball simulation seen from a side-view perspective, meaning it is only possible to move players to the left or right. The player can choose between three different leagues: Men's League, Woman's League and Hyper League, which is a league for robots. Two buttons are used to control the ball, one for normal actions and one for "Hyper Plays", special attacks that can only be learned and used in the Hyper League. How a player will block or attack depends on the ball's speed and the players position. Team members who aren't under the player's direct control will also act on their own by positioning themselves or preparing spikes. They will, however, not block spikes on their own but it is possible to let players not under direct control block spikes by pressing one of the action buttons at the right moment.

78885.name: Spore Origins
78885.summary: Spore Origins is the mobile device spin-off of Spore, and focuses on a single phase of the larger game's gameplay - the cell phase. The simplified game allows players to try to survive as a multicellular organism in a tide pool, with the ability to upgrade its creature as with the main game.

163602.name: Tiger Fighter 1931: MP044
163602.summary: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. The DLC include map pack 044.

59795.name: Space Sweeper
59795.summary: A cloud computing multiplayer action game from SquareEnix's Shinra Technologies division.

130036.name: The Simpsons: Hit & Run - Donut Mod
130036.summary: Donut Mod is a re-imagining of the original Simpsons: Hit & Run story.

176246.name: Siren Head Resurrection
176246.summary: A group of young cave divers went missing. The local ranger is not responding. Action adventure about Siren Head.

169369.name: Innocent Girl
169369.summary: Great game modes, consisting of a different of nice games with innocent girls. Exiting atmosphere, great SFX, levels with beautiful artworks.

79130.name: Void Excursion
79130.summary: A spaceship speeds through the void of space as you try to reach the edge of it. Avoid the planets and debris so you can go as far as you can into the stars!

100290.name: Kids Slide Puzzle World mystic squares 15 game

66729.name: Astro Ranch
66729.summary: Space Farming hits the iPad. Think Animal Crossing meets Harvest Moon in a 1950s sci-fi setting.

57302.name: The Trail
57302.summary: The Trail is a mobile game from Peter Molyneux. In which you join other pioneers on a vast journey across the country. When you reach Eden Falls, you can also settle and buy a house to store objects you collect during your journey. You are also able to interact with other players through standard phrases.

61071.name: Birth Order
61071.summary: Birth Order is a horizontal scrolling shoot’em up with a few twists.

58159.name: Midnight Star: Renegade
58159.summary: Midnight Star: Renegade is a mobile shooter from IndustrialToys.

65670.name: B-Daman Baku Gaiden: Victory e no Michi
65670.summary: B-Daman Baku Gaiden: Victory e no Michi is an RPG game for the Game Boy Color.

58068.name: Achar Chronicles: Oblitus
58068.summary: An adventure game from Fallen Feather Studio.

49573.name: From TV animation One Piece: Nanatsu Shima no Daihihou
49573.summary: One Piece: Nanatsu Shima no Daihihou is a Japan only RPG game for Game Boy Advance.

66806.name: Star Battle
66806.summary:
A surreptitious video game rehash of the Death Star trench sequence from Star Wars, the player controls an X-Wing shaped aircraft firing at a TIE-Fighter (human or CPU controlled).
Before starting out a maximum score (1-999) is entered and the player that first reaches it wins the game. A single hit is enough to bring down the enemy ship and it is worth one point.

163096.name: Tead
163096.summary: Tead is a murder mystery visual novel game set in the present day.

38872.name: Vex Blocks
38872.summary:
Electrify your mobile device with this futuristic, block-blasting puzzler! 
 
“Vex Blocks” is the easy-to-play, exciting and addictive block game. Match up blocks by symbol and/or color to draw the longest chain of lightning possible. Draw lightning chains on your screen to surround and neutralize bomb blocks before they explode or to capture power-ups and increase your coin count. Collect coins to unlock new game modes or to gear up with unique power-ups like the Black Hole, X-Block or Nuke to help you along the way. Challenge your friends to beat your score and earn more coins, or team up and take on our score trials together! 
 
Are you up to the challenge? Download now! 
Available on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.itzyinteractive.vexblocksfull 
 
Game Features: 
 
—————————————————– 
 
FOUR WAYS TO PLAY 
 
* FREEPLAY: Relax with a screen full of blocks just waiting to be ELECTRIFIED AND EXPLODED! BOO YAH! 
 
* TIMED: How long can you keep playing? Rack up as many points as you can while earning precious seconds with each lightning chain as you race the clock in the timed mode. 
 
* ARCADE: Use your lightning or power-ups to destroy blocks and reach your level goal, but don’t let the falling blocks fill the screen as the difficulty increases with each level. 
 
* PUZZLE: 80+ puzzles. Can you clear the blocks in the fewest moves possible? Challenge each unique puzzle level and clear all blocks without using up all your moves. 
—————————————————– 
 
PLAY WITH FRIENDS 
Connect to Facebook and challenge your Android and iOS friends to earn a higher score, or play cooperatively to beat score trials and earn even more coins. 
 
CONTROL GRAVITY 
Rotate your device to alter gravity and change the block configuration, or use gravity to help you surround and capture Mystery Block power-ups or to neutralize Bomb Blocks before they deaden the blocks around them! 
 
CROSS PLATFORM PLAY 
Play Vex Blocks on your phone while on-the-go, then connect to Facebook and access your power-up arsenal and view existing friend challenges on your tablet at home and continue the action across devices and operating systems. 
 
EARN UNIQUE POWER-UPS 
Capture Mystery blocks in game to add to your power-up arsenal or earn/purchase coins to select each strategic power-up for later use.

105083.name: Trek: Travel Around the World
105083.summary: In Trek: Travel Around the World, the adventure starts in your new Helsinki apartment. Each experience after that transports you to a new destination where real-world locations are blended with magical phenomenon: Catching fishes in the Archipelago in order to fill the sky with the majestic Northern Lights, powering the city of Helsinki as a giant in the capital of Finland, and tracing the stars to highlight the constellations in the sky.

128278.name: Sliding Puzzle Collection
128278.summary: Sliding Puzzle Collection is a traditional sliding puzzle game with a relaxing atmosphere.

43800.name: Buttsubushi
43800.summary: Puzzles and action - enjoy a new sense of play in two ways. Lead the character to use the key block in a total of 100 levels and a multiplayer mode for up to four people can play simultaneously.

27494.name: Keitai Denjuu Telefang 2: Power
27494.summary:
Monster capture/battle sequel. 
 
Like the previous game, Keitai Denjuu Telefang 2 comes in Power and Speed varieties. In this incarnation, players take control of a young man named Kyou, who is trapped in the Denjuu World when a sinister Denjuu called Diablos destroys all but one of the Antenna Trees, which are the conduit between the human world and the Denjuu World. Kyou must raise his Denjuu partners and prevent Diablos from destroying the last Antenna Tree.

150081.name: Dino Hunt
150081.summary: Dino Hunt is a single-player shareware game. The objective is to get Nicky Neanderthal back to his cave after first hunting the many dinosaurs that inhabit the area.

130020.name: Sonic Freedom
130020.summary: Sonic Freedom is a 2D hand drawn platformer developed by tripplejaz and marmitoTH in Unity. The sonic fan game wants to bring Sonic into the modern era of platformers with a faithful recreation of momentum based gameplay, drawing on mechanical and level design inspiration from recent metroidvania titles like “Hollow Knight” and “Ori and the Blind Forest,” coupled with an aesthetic grounded in 90s anime as seen in the Sonic CD Toei animations and the “Sonic the Hedgehog” OVA.

77459.name: Airsoft
77459.summary: Airsoft is a new interactive game mixing exciting elements of First Person Shooters with the freedom of a mobile game.

61140.name: Ride 'Em Rigby: Regular Show
61140.summary: Ride 'Em Rigby: Regular Show is a 2D action game from Cartoon Network.

176304.name: Pirate's Pension
176304.summary: Where did I bury my treasure again?

107152.name: Decay Z : Space Survival
107152.summary: After the earth fall in 2088 - a group of nations establishes a secret project called "iCarus" to send out people to find a new earth (Utopia). this spaceship will spent 200 years for traveling to "Utopia". Unfortunately , some supplys contain "Z-Virus" , people who contact with that supply get infested and mutated , the infested can not control itself and start attack everything.the scientist name "Sayame MiM" the leader of "iCarus" project try to protect the last group of survivors from infested by cut off the electricity of security door but it make power reactor damaged. The last group of survivors have to restore the system back and make everything back to normal. the time had pass until one of engineer in the spaceship wake up from hyper sleep. he will be the one who gonna tell us what is the rest of the story should be.

156111.name: The Tower Of TigerQiuQiu: The Deep The Hill
156111.summary: AboutIt's harder to get to the top of the game, carefully avoiding falling boulders and organ flying knives. There will be an alert before the boulder falls, and flying knives will become more frequent as the level progresses. Bravely get the top chest.

24712.name: World of Animals: Pets 'n Pals Collection

27199.name: Phantom Halls
27199.summary: Enter a haunted mansion and prepare to face the undead terrors that stalk the phantom halls! Squad up to survive the night using whatever you can find, but remember - you can’t kill what you can’t see, so be sure to bring a flashlight…

61100.name: A Tale of Survival
61100.summary: A Tale of Survival is a randomly generated open world survival game from Dynamic Zero.

28338.name: Kickoff Legends
28338.summary: Kickoff Legends is a multi-player, cross-platform football team management game. It's a real time football multi-player game that is fast and fun. Matches are played in real time. Any platform against any platform!

54320.name: Recovery Search & Rescue Simulation
54320.summary:
Strap on your boots and hook up your compass - as a new recruit to Rescue Team One, you’ll need to use your expert tracking skills to locate a variety of important objects and missing people who have stumbled into the harsh and perilous dangers of your national park. 
 
Navigate woodland trails, deep ravines and fast-flowing rivers on the trail of a journalist looking for the thrill of adventure, or locate some missing pharmaceuticals to save a hiker’s life. Your skills are paramount for the safety of your visitors. 
 
However, it is not all walk in the park; the lush forest can quickly turn into a dangerous trek as you come across some of nature’s most dangerous obstacles, including tar pits, deep chasms and angry beasts.

155938.name: 天下为棋
155938.summary: This is an oriental fantasy game of turn-based strategy. On the basis of the traditional turn-based strategy game, it incorporates a more rational growth model, stronger role mechanisms, deeper strategic caps, and rich collection of growth elements.

100298.name: Invasion
100298.summary:
The end of the world, and there's something after you. 
 
A short horror Twine about sacrifice, survival, and relative humanity.

126795.name: Death To The Dragon Lord
126795.summary: For over a millennia the land of Aforn has been under the tyrannical rule of the Dragon Lord. All attempts to overthrow him have led to near genocide, but the Dragon Lord's cruelty is so great that despite the consequences another revolt is brewing.

176303.name: Its a Pirate-Game!
176303.summary: A top-down minimalist pixel game about dodging pirates and their bullets!

158039.name: Fox Spirit: A Two-Tailed Adventure
158039.summary: Dazzle humanity or destroy it as a magical, two-tailed fox! Weave illusions, shapeshift, or control minds. You'll set the world on fire, one way or another.

56132.name: Dungeon Superballs
56132.summary: A Challenging Indie 3D Isometric Platform Game. It's the previous version of the final game 'The Dungeon Power'

78085.name: Fireworks
78085.summary: Free augmented reality game for the PS Vita where you detonate fireworks before they crash into the ground.

192464.name: Neon Racer
192464.summary: Endless road, neon lights, palm trees. The game immerses you in the atmosphere of retrowave. Welcome to Neon Racer! Neon Racer is a car simulator game in which you drive along the endless road and avoid other cars.

180447.name: The Lost Residents
180447.summary: You decide to take matters into your own hands to solve a missing people's case.

97040.name: Diner Bros
97040.summary: Diner Bros is a frantic cooking and restaurant management game where you must cook and serve meals to your customers before they get too hungry. You just opened your diner. As the first customers take their seats, you rush to the kitchen. One customer doesn’t want tomato in his burger, while the other one wants a drink. Those tables won’t clean up themselves either… If you take too long, your customers will leave angry and hungry, and you’ll soon go out of business!

157144.name: Toaster Defense
157144.summary: Shoot, dash, and smash enemies in this fast-paced tower defense platformer. Build turrets to aid in your defenses and find the deadliest combination. Protect the toaster -- at all costs!

170154.name: DCS World: F-5E - Aggressors Air Combat Maneuver Campaign
170154.summary: The F-5E Aggressors ACM campaign puts you in the cockpit of an F-5E Tiger II, as a new Aggressor pilot with the 65th Aggressor Squadron at Nellis Air Force Base. Based on real world procedures you will fly as Red Air against Blue Air Forces.

28643.name: England Exchange
28643.summary: An International Affair! Play as a (male or female) American college student spending a semester abroad in London. Build a new future by living, studying, working, and dating in England. Both straight and same-sex romances are available, but not all loves may have a happy ending...

128113.name: Magnet Fishing Simulator
128113.summary: Are you bored of traditional fishing? Put your rod away and search in outdoor waters for ferromagnetic objects available to pull with a strong neodymium magnet. Find rare and valuable items, restore them, and sell!

10990.name: Thunder Wolves
10990.summary:
Thunder Wolves is a third-person shoot-'em-up game.
Support the Thunder Wolves in their global battle against terrorism. Take part in varied operations and do whatever it takes to thwart the diabolical plans of your enemies! Defeat them once and for all, and save the world!

75789.name: All That Remains
75789.summary: All That Remains is a 90's inspired eerily atmospheric adventure narrative that lets you experience one man’s life as he comes to terms with his final moments on an abandoned Earth.

49798.name: Puzzle & Tantei Collection
49798.summary: Puzzle & Tantei Collection is a Miscellaneous game, published by Culture Brain, which was released in Japan in 2003.

133158.name: Sound Science
133158.summary: Greetings, future scientist! I am the Honorable, Sir Lord Dr. Professor Walrus, Ph.D., D.V.M., D.D.S., M.D., Esquire the Third! Together, you and I shall embark upon a journey to understand sound! Welcome to Sound Science!

71165.name: Before the Legacy
71165.summary: A Point And Click Adventure Game created by Sam Gray as part of the Reality-On-The-Norm project.

134583.name: FORSPOKEN
134583.summary: Forspoken is the culmination of Luminous Productions’ philosophy to create a completely new and fresh gaming experiences that fuses together the latest technologies with art.

80491.name: Auto Club Revolution
80491.summary: Auto Club Revolution is a browser-based online racing game and car community. You'll be able to own, upgrade and customise officially licensed cars to create your ultimate online garage, then share them with friends, use them in multiplayer races or complete single player challenges.

107529.name: Cosmos Defense
107529.summary: A strategy planetary defense game across the galaxy. Defend your territories while planing for your future.

137633.name: LEGO Marvel's Avengers: Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. Pack
137633.summary: Based on season 2 of the Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. television series, this DLC adds a brand-new level, eleven characters, and an additional vehicle to your LEGO Marvel's Avengers journey!

7605.name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Pripyat
7605.summary:
The events of S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Pripyat unfold shortly after the end of S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Shadow of Chernobyl. Having discovered about the open path to the Zone center, the government decides to hold a large-scale military "Fairway" operation aimed to take the CNPP under control. 
 
According to the operation's plan, the first military group is to conduct an air scouting of the territory to map out the detailed layouts of anomalous fields location. Thereafter, making use of the maps, the main military forces are to be dispatched. Despite thorough preparations, the operation fails. Most of the avant-garde helicopters crash. In order to collect information on reasons behind the operation failure, Ukraine's Security Service sends their agent into the Zone center. 
 
From now on, everything depends on you.

79885.name: The Lost Mind of Dr. Brain
79885.summary: This game is the third in the Dr. Brain series. Solve logic, math, and other puzzling conundrums designed to stress your brain.

93105.name: Tremulous
93105.summary:
Tremulous is a free, open source game that blends a team based FPS with elements of an RTS. 
 
Players can choose from 2 unique races, aliens and humans. Players on both teams are able to build working structures in-game like an RTS. These structures provide many functions, the most important being spawning. The designated builders must ensure there are spawn structures or other players will not be able to rejoin the game after death. Other structures provide automated base defense (to some degree), healing functions and much more...

31780.name: Mu Cartographer
31780.summary:
Mu Cartographer is a contemplative game experience that combines colourful sandbox and experimental treasure hunt. 
 
Learn to operate an abstract machine in order to shape and explore colourful landscapes and find the mysteries hidden in a shifting world.

150250.name: Jurassic Extinction
150250.summary: Survive an island, in an unknown time and place. Encounter dinosaurs, humans, and find a way back home, fight and kill to find your way...

190134.name: Galactic Frontier
190134.summary: Galactic Frontier is a story focused Sci-Fi explorative twin stick shooter. Embark on an intergalactic adventure in the chaotic and war torn expanse of what was the Milky Way. Fight alongside rebels or repress them! Become a pirate or submit to the Machine Plague, choose your own destiny.

192500.name: Solitaire Bonbon
192500.summary: Cook lots of sweets and enjoy it! 200 levels in the sweet world theme!

53810.name: Time To Die: Adventures
53810.summary: Embark on a dangerous journey through winding caverns and treacherous ruins, collecting treasures and battling monsters! Time To Die: Adventures is a top-down dungeon-crawler, inspired by classic arcade games and a love of adventure.

79112.name: CoreTechs Tactics
79112.summary: Fair-to-play tactical wargaming meets collectible deck-building, with an emphasis on community creation.

59989.name: Sweet Clown: Gozen San-ji no Okashi na Doukeshi

28284.name: Jay and Silent Bob: Chronic Blunt Punch
28284.summary:
Jump in the shoes of Lunch Box and Mr. Snoogans in a colorful Side-scrolling 2.5D over-the-top multiplayer brawler! Play as the dynamic duo alone or with a friend in a tag team combo fight fest. Destroy your enemies with fists, feet, and the magic of self-esteem destroying shit talk while you embark on a mission to find your long lost pot customers trapped in an Orwellian shopping center.

Jay and Silent Bob: Chronic Blunt Punch is a colorful side-scrolling tag-team beat-em-up where players swap back and forth between our heroes on the fly or perform special moves simultaneously with a friend. Our heroes embark on an epic adventure from the humble corners where they ply their trade to the gates of hell itself.

103380.name: Bloons TD 6
103380.summary: The Bloons are back and better than ever! Craft your perfect defense from a combination of awesome monkey towers, upgrades, Heroes, and activated abilities, then pop every last Bloon that comes your way!

104871.name: Fatman Simulator
104871.summary: Fatman Simulator is a simulation game in which you can experience the life of a overweight programmer. Try your best to lose weight and earn a better life!

38918.name: Avabel Online
38918.summary:
AVABEL ONLINE is a 3D-MMORPG that delivers the best in smartphone graphics. 
Users can enjoy the games exhilarating features, such as smooth combo strikes, sequential attacks with jump action, etc in the same world. Enjoy hunting monsters and quests in the MMO field "Main Tower" (multiplayer field), or the "Dungeon" in the MO Field (Played by parties or by solo), the PvP (Player versus player), or the tower scramble where a max of 1000 players fight each other in real time all with the best graphics.

180521.name: Missing Stars: Act One
180521.summary: A visual novel about mental disorders and the people they affect. Made with Ren'Py.

94508.name: Fengse Huanxiang 3: Zui yu Fa de Zhenhunge

180381.name: In an attempt to save the innocents

100072.name: You Don't Know Jack
100072.summary: The original game in Jellyvision's (later Jackbox Games) comedic trivia series.

54452.name: ArkanoidSmoking
54452.summary:
Unusual arkanoid with interesting levels and music back on personal computers with unusual graphics! 
Who knows, maybe this game will help you to quit Smoking.

64841.name: Pendulous
64841.summary: A challenging pendulum trip through a steam-driven clockwork world. Swing from anchor to anchor, using shifting pipes and steam jets to hurry you to a fast finish.

100832.name: ModernArcheryVR
100832.summary: Reset and refresh your mind with VR and Competitive Archery!

40252.name: S.S. Mission
40252.summary: S.S. Mission was produced by Comad in 1992.

81114.name: NeuroMatrix
81114.summary: NEO Near - Earth - Object. Sci-fi action adventure puzzle video game. Futuristic design 3d environment & first person view. You are an artificial specialist and take part in a space expedition, whose mission is to explore and investigate a strange and mysterious space installation.

103146.name: Abyss and Dark: The King's Secret Pledge

160358.name: Tiger Tank 59 Ⅰ: Black Hill Fortress MP045
160358.summary: Tiger Tank 59 is a top-down shooting game. In this game, players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. The DLC include the map pack 045.

62291.name: Jeff the Killer Revenge
62291.summary: Jeff the Killer Revenge is an exploratory horror game where players do all that they can to stay alive whilst a supernatural serial killer stalks them.

68180.name: SHOPPING SIMULATOR MULTIPLAYER
68180.summary: SHOPPING SIMULATOR MULTIPLAYER is a brand new contest simulator game. Try to put everything into the shopping cart ,which is listed in your shopping list before the other customers! Hurry, because time’s up!You can be juggler to win and steal the products from others or you can knocked over shopping cart of the other players.Be circumspect and fast enough and be the best customer!

143959.name: Louie
143959.summary: Old school platform puzzle action. Find all the ice cream in each level, and escape! Hunt for secrets. Use the in-game level editor to craft your own unique challenges!

141947.name: Space Loner Chronicle
141947.summary: Sea Green is totally alone in space, and she like, loves it, of course!

62141.name: Space Live: Advent of the Net Idols
62141.summary: Humanity abandoned reality and decided to reside in Net Space. Net Space is divided into a number of factions, and every four years, they hold a concert for control of all the Spaces. With such high stakes at play, the heated battle between Space Idols shall commence!

130232.name: GrandNestling
130232.summary: 《GrandNestling》 is an detective Gal game, whose game object is to use limited clues to investigate and uncover crimes, as well as to help the main character Lanye to free himself from the shadow of a car incident and to find his life goal.

42694.name: Super Stardust Delta
42694.summary:
Blast through an addictive shooter where one wrong move could be your last. 
 
Create incredible black holes using the touchscreen, blast asteroids to pieces using the dual analog sticks and deploy devastating shock waves with motion sensitive gameplay. 
Enjoy classic gameplay modes from Super Stardust HD and Super Stardust Portable, as well as new modes exclusive to PS Vita. 
Shoot your way to the top of the intergalactic leaderboards via PlayStation Network.

128452.name: Former Future
128452.summary: Former Future is a strategic top-down 2D shooter where you face an invading alien threat on the frontier world of Saturn and its neighboring moons.

100157.name: Morkredd
100157.summary:
The Orb is your fate.  
  
Morkredd is a tense, physics-based co-op puzzle game for one to two players combining skill-based puzzle-solving, a challenging balance of light and shadow, and a dark world full of secrets to unlock. 
 
The Orb Calls for Two: Morkredd is best played as a couch co-op experience. Heed the Orb’s call with a friend or prove your loyalty alone by mastering the unique dual-character controls. 
Your Path is the Orb: You are the Orb’s protector, and the Orb’s light is yours. Survive and master over 60 puzzles while avoiding the shadows caused by your partner and the environment. 
The Orb is Your Only Friend: An endless abyss of deadly shadows conceal dangers in this cold, dark world. Stay with the Orb if you want to stay alive. 
Gaze into the Orb: Discover ancient secrets about the Orb hidden in the darkness.

4839.name: Halo: Spartan Assault
4839.summary: Enlist as a Spartan soldier and sharpen your tactical skills in battle! Set between the events of Halo 3 and Halo 4, Halo: Spartan Assault, developed by 343 Industries in conjunction with Vanguard Games, is a new chapter within the award-winning Halo universe. Spanning over 30 missions in vibrant, dangerous worlds, dive deeper into the backstory of Human-Covenant wars and the origins of the Spartan Ops program.

75383.name: Mystery Stone from Heaven
75383.summary: Mystery Stone from Heaven is a decoding and exploration game. Player would act as a prehistoric archaeologist. In 2008, he excavated a shinning fragment in Shuidongou. After researching historical document, he got to know this stone consist three parts and its name is ‘Po’. He traversed to Shuidonggou Canyon which existed in 40,000 years ago. Furthermore, he found that this canyon was made by a huge maze. In this journey, you would meet lots prehistoric animals, learnt skills from stone age, collect the skeletons of an elegant princess and know about the secret about this stone. After got the second stone fragment, player would pass through the Great Wall in Ming dynasty and seek the last fragment of stone.

62612.name: Favela Wars
62612.summary: Turn-based strategy, browser-based, online game set in a dystopic Rio de Janeiro in the year 2040.

58509.name: Koushien: Konpeki no Sora
58509.summary: The final game in the Koushien series

180531.name: So you think you can Chad?: An Incel Dating Sim
180531.summary: Incel asks Chad's help to get girls to like him. You won't believe what happens next.

114355.name: LOTUS Minigames: United Nations
114355.summary: A very basic implementation of a shedding-type card game. Play with your friends and be the best of you!

26370.name: Abode
26370.summary:
In Abode you'll visit a Sci-fi noir apartment. Inspired by "escape the room" games. 
You will pick up, inspect, open, repair or utilize objects or furniture in the room in order to unveil all its secrets.

120610.name: A Kingdom of Flesh and Stone
120610.summary: KoFnS is a resource gathering survival game with plans leading into strategy style game play. There are three primary staged objectives we wish to hit with the game to get it where we wanted it to go and hope you enjoy playing and testing it out as it makes that journey.

176289.name: Cursed Island
176289.summary: One man. One desire. A lot of skeletons.

146061.name: Sakura Forest Girls
146061.summary: Yaya, a plucky young huntress, and Aiyana, a shy girl born into a family of shamans, go on a journey to find their missing childhood friend, Koko. Along the way they meet a mischievous witch, Maia, and sparks fly.

49641.name: Cesti to Meigurumi-tachi no Mahou no Bouken: Kisekko Gurumii
49641.summary: Cesti to Meigurumi-tachi no Mahou no Bouken: Kisekko Gurumii is an Adventure game, published by MTO, which was released in Japan in 2003.

96105.name: Dodge Club Pocket
96105.summary: The underground ravers of Dodge Club invite YOU to play in their pixel dance party. Dodge the red hot fireball and electric spark in a variety of unique minigame challenges, each one more wild than the last! As you play, you'll even unlock mysterious bonus content in the form of "presents", including new characters, comics by Linzb0t, extra music, and more. Speck and her raver friends can't wait to meet you, so join the club now on your Nintendo 3DS with Dodge Club Pocket!

10316.name: Fate of the Pharaoh
10316.summary: The greedy enemy wanted the treasures of Egypt. Long time attacks exhausted the magnificent realm of Pharaoh. Days of glory are far behind now, wrapped in dust of endless deserts. But, there's hope! The enemy finally fled! Take the role of brave young Pharaoh's adviser and raise the golden cities of Egypt once again in this fun and beautiful strategy/management game. Construct homes for your people, set-up production, trade, please gods, fight crocodiles and dangerous cobras while build monuments and famous wonders of Egyptian realm.
