149181.summary: Explore the surface of the Moon aboard the Lunar Rover and discover famous landing sites. From the Apollo space program to the Soviet Luna missions, there are plenty of sites to explore. Experience driving in lower gravity on a unique open world map.

42236.name: Pachinko Fan: Shouri Sengen
42236.summary: Pachinko Fan: Shouri Sengen is a Miscellaneous game, published by Pow, which was released in Japan in 1994.

51833.name: Myst V: End of Ages - Limited Edition

27422.name: Shenmue HD Remaster
27422.summary: An ambitious project to remaster Shenmue that was eventually cancelled.

164268.name: The Jovian System
164268.summary: The Jovian System is a hard sci-fi RPG with turn-based combat and base-building elements set near Jupiter.

37891.name: Parlor! Mini 5
37891.summary: Parlor! Mini 5 is a Miscellaneous game, published by Nippon Telenet, which was released in Japan in 1997.

121401.name: Bulletorium
121401.summary: Bulletorium is a dynamic and fast top-down shooter with a lot of shootouts, base capture and management, AI controlling and various upgrades and boss fights.

149305.name: Lux: The Journey
149305.summary: Explore a beautiful and mysterious world in Lux: The Journey. Seek lost knowledge, craft, build, survive the dark and find your destiny.

125579.name: 3am
125579.summary: First person atmospheric horror where you play as a Youtuber! While doing a livestream, solve your way out of an abandoned, open world building which is in need of an exorcist! Demons like playing games, you will have to use your fast wit to complete the 3AM Challenge! Good luck!

94573.name: Every Extend
94573.summary: An interesting freeware game from Japanese software house OMEGA, Every Extend is a top-down action game (over a 3D background) in which you control a bomb - literally, a bomb - which you must maneuver for maximum damage. Enemy cubes of various kinds move around the playfield and by triggering an explosion at the right moment you can create massive chain reactions which wipe your enemies out.

73727.name: The Adventures of Robbo
73727.summary: Guide Robbo the robot through the level while avoiding the lasers and other nasty things

57986.name: Clash For Dawn
57986.summary: PvP focused mobile game with eight classes, guild wars, dragon pets, mercenaries,

103813.name: Queen of Spades
103813.summary: Since ancient times, it is believed that any mirror can become a portal to the world dead. One of the oldest rituals with a mirror is the rite of the call of the Queen of Spades.

118226.name: Caliper 2
118226.summary: Caliper 2 is an absolute, turn-based puzzle. By manipulating objects with different properties, you need to put some object on the button and enter the portal.

176337.name: Sandu ish!
176337.summary: Prove suas habilidades na cozinha fazendo o sanduíche natural mais suculento !

37895.name: Parlor! Mini
37895.summary: Parlor! Mini is a Miscellaneous game, published by Nippon Telenet, which was released in Japan in 1996.

88749.name: Cradle of Empires
88749.summary: Free Match 3 Puzzle & City Building Game!

125212.name: Sternenschweif 3D - Das Geheimnis im Zauberwald
125212.summary: Laura and her pony are inseparable. But Starlight is not an ordinary horse, because when Laura speaks the magic formula, it turns into a radiantly beautiful unicorn.

72110.name: Rescue Rover 2
72110.summary: Players must again save Rover from evil robots in this sequel to id Software's Rescue Rover.

192514.name: MoveUp
192514.summary: Overwhelmed and want to escape the stresses of daily life, Move Up can help you unwind as you catch a well-deserved break. Power on your VR equipment and step into the game, where the simple task of stacking blocks can evoke the deepest and most satisfying feelings of accomplishment and relaxation.

89102.name: Tales from the Dragon Mountain: the Lair

23565.name: Carnival Cruise Line Tycoon 2005: Island Hopping

79739.name: Dr. Lunatic Supreme with Cheese
79739.summary: Players fight zombies and collect brains throughout the course of over 1000 levels.

113176.name: NeoGeometry
113176.summary: Welcome back to the world of Neo! Your task is to deliver the NeoBriquette with the help of coups in the desired point. Beware Neo walls that can kill you. Just do not fall out of the field.

54933.name: Aozora Under Girls!
54933.summary: Idol battle card game released on iOS and Android devices.

24227.name: Pinball FX 2: Star Wars
24227.summary:
Based on events from Star Warsᵀᴹ: The Force Awakensᵀᴹ, players will be able to experience unforgettable moments from the film on two action-packed pinball tables. 
 
Team up with the Resistance to fight against the First Order alongside Rey, Finn, Poe, General Leia and Han Solo in the Star Wars™ Pinball: The Force Awakens™ Table! 
 
Take command of the First Order as you travel through hyperspace on board a Star Destroyer and restore order to a galaxy far, far away on the Star Wars™ Pinball: Might of the First Order table!

179780.name: Let's Meat Adam
179780.summary: Let's MEAT Adam is a Bara, BxB visual novel set in a neon NIGHTMARE of an escape room turned death game. Muscles, Blood, Escape, Trust, Betray, MEAT.

75382.name: Mount Hill
75382.summary:
A terrible accident at a nuclear test site has led to a radioactive cloud engulfing the suburbs. 
Mount Hill citizens got stuck at ground zero of the infection zone, and were forced into quarantine.

192507.name: Back again
192507.summary: Can you make it to the end of this punishing 3D platformer or will you be stuck in the void? Back again features: Challenging levels to test your skill and patience, a unique changing soundtrack with a light narrative and creepy atmosphere. Also includes Survival Mode

122009.name: Brother 2 - Back to America (Брат 2 - Обратно в Америку)

22640.name: Microsoft Flight
22640.summary:
Microsoft Flight is an aviation game from Microsoft Studios created as a successor to the discontinued Microsoft Flight Simulator series. The game is offered "free-to-play"; charging gamers for downloading extra content, aircraft or scenery. 
 
In July 2012, Microsoft ceased development of the game permanently to re-align its "long-term goals and development plans." The core game, which includes the Icon A5 aircraft and the Big Island of Hawaii scenery area, remains free to download. It can then be expanded with additional downloadable content (DLC) from the integrated Games For Windows Marketplace on Xbox-Live . 
 
Microsoft closed the Xbox.com PC Marketplace on August 22, 2013. Previous items purchased are still usable, and the Flight software may still be downloadable, but no items can be acquired through the marketplace.

45482.name: Sega Ages: Volume 1
45482.summary: Sega Ages: Volume 1 contains three games previously released in Japan as stand-alone titles; Sega Ages Vol.2 Space Harrier, Sega Ages OutRun and Sega Ages After Burner II.

84137.name: MinSweeper
84137.summary: MinSweeper is a minimalist take on the classic Minesweeper. Simple relaxing game play in which you avoid mines on a puzzle board and try to get the best time. MinSweeper also includes 3 minigames

121434.name: Mayor Moon
121434.summary:
Welcome to Mayor Moon. Let us celebrate the 50th landing on the moon. Let's play, what would happen if we stayed there? 
 
Play now and see your first settlers landing on the moon. Help them to grow to a city. Mine resources, process them to higher goods, research and unlock buildings. Take care of your colonists, feed them, let them do work and and explorer the secrets on the moon.

81207.name: Outpost Zero
81207.summary: A Sci-Fi First Person Shooter with Base Building, Resource Management, and elements of Survival. You play as an AI Overseer sent from Earth entrusted with the future of humankind, and tasked with establishing a habitat that can sustain human life on a mysterious alien world.​

176325.name: The Rapid Treasure Escape
176325.summary: Be a pirate & work together with your partner to save your treasure in a breathtaking raft ride through caribbean waters

50313.name: Brink of Consciousness: Dorian Gray Syndrome
50313.summary: Venture into the realm of a madman to free your beloved from captivity in this hidden object adventure! As reporter Sam Wilde, you must work quickly to unravel a bizarre series of disappearances involving young and beautiful people. Sam's every move is being tracked so he has to be extra careful. Putting his journalistic talents to the test, Sam must find the maniac who has kidnapped Anna, and stop him before it's too late.

181853.name: Don't Call Me Mama But Yes I Am Your Mama

44539.name: NieR: Automata - Limited Edition Steelbook
44539.summary:
Invaders from another world attack without warning - unleashing the machine lifeforms. To break the deadlock, a new breed of android infantry is sent into the fray: the YoRHa squad. NieR: AutomataTM is a fresh take on the action role-playing game (RPG) genre that gracefully blends mesmerising action with a captivating story.  
 
The Limited Edition will include: 
- An exclusive Steelbook with illustrations of characters Akihiko Yoshida  
- All the DLC content in Day1 Edition: 
 • Machine Mask Accessory 
 • Grimoire Weiss Pod 
 • Play System Pod Skin 
 • Retro Grey Pod Skin 
 • Retro Red Skin 
 • Cardboard Pod Skin

155756.name: BulletGarden
155756.summary: BulletGarden is a 2D vertical shooting gamewhere you explore a planet where the seeds you sow blossom into weapons.You can handle about 300 different types of weapons,each with its own unique characteristics.

184080.name: Parmesan
184080.summary: an 8-bit story about a non-binary person being bullied for being who they are

41716.name: Girly Block
41716.summary: A supercomputer called "Omega" has kidnapped a valious asset. At your hands the most powerful unit to stand a chance to rescue her.

31612.name: Grapply
31612.summary: Grapply is a racing game where players use grapple beams to pull themselves around tracks and through the air racing against the AI.

38498.name: The Fable of Ruby
38498.summary:
Ruby is a girl works for a worker in laboratory on the uncanny tower. She spend her life peacefully. 
But she suffer crisis suddenly. So this game is her adventure overcoming her crisis. 
 
You can get various weapon and equipments, explore dungeons and upgrade your items. It is main play style of "The Fable of Ruby". And it give you plentiful play because dungeons is made up about 10 stages and over 200 rooms.

144324.name: Arduventure
144324.summary: A small turn-based RPG for the Arduboy.

15759.name: Quake: Mission Pack 2 - Dissolution of Eternity
15759.summary:
Two new episodes. Sixteen new levels. One way out.

Your journey has led you down a path of no return. The acrid smell of death fills the air. And you know the road ahead may lead to your grave. But Quake, with his insidious, apocalyptic plans, must be crushed. If you fail, evil will shroud the universe for all eternity.

78979.name: Puzzle DeFusion
78979.summary: Puzzle DeFusion is an XNA community game

133856.name: Mucho Taco
133856.summary:
Build and manage tasty taco restaurants and upgrade their production and operating hours. 
 
With the guidance of Barbacoatl, an enigmatic taco connoisseur, find the ancient map that leads to a secret ritual ground. If a Tacologist were to complete this map and journey to this ancient place, then he would be able to harness the cosmic power of the Taco and bring even more tacos to the universe! 
 
Stats and Achievements! Try to get all the achievements, and keep track of every taco you have ever made!

44587.name: Brain Challenge Deluxe
44587.summary: Released in Europe in 2008 and for the PSN in 2009.

62492.name: Virtua Fighter CG Portrait Series Vol. 1: Sarah Bryant
62492.summary: Virtua Fighter CG Portrait Series Vol. 1: Sarah Bryant is a collection of images of Sarah from Virtua Fighter.

31845.name: Bumper
31845.summary: BUMPER is a casual game made on Blender Game Engine where the player must to destroy the vehicles as much as possible, trying not to get caught by the police, reach the checkpoints to get time and improve your weapons.

14706.name: Beef Drop
14706.summary: Beef Drop is a port of the popular arcade game Burgertime, which Ken Siders first ported to the Atari 5200 and 8-bit computers. This version of Beef Drop beature POKEY sound support, for much better audio than the 7800 can produce without this chip. The 7800 version also features better graphics than the 5200/8-bit version, making the 7800 version the definitive release of Beef Drop.

88593.name: Hey Duggee: The Big Badge App

82874.name: Weakest Demon King - Escape! You Cannot Defeat The Female Heroines!

68416.name: Valhyre
68416.summary: Valhyre Deathmatch is a shooter that serves as a proof of concept for the upcoming MMORPG Valhyre: The Aftermath. It was released as an XNA community game for the Xbox 360.

111769.name: Brocat: the B Game
111769.summary: Side-scroller with nostalgic memes. Dynamic strong B game, with Brocat as the main character and bugs that were carefully preserved by Developer.

106530.name: Tetra's Escape
106530.summary: Tetra's Escape is a platforming puzzle-game all about blocks. Blocks named Tetras and it is down to the players to all that they can, to save them and make the most out of their special ability.

41201.name: Number Builder
41201.summary:
Number Builder is an single screen educational platformer to help you improve your maths over twelve levels. You play the role of a builder who must move around a building site, climbing ladders, looking for sums to make a target number. You are given a starting number and you must pick up sums to add or subtract from that number to make the target number. Each level is split into three different target numbers and each must be completed before a bucket is lifted to the top of the screen. Once a level is completed you get paid money before attempting the next level. 
 
Before you play the game you can select your starting level as well as your builder who vary in different speeds. There is also a Self Test where you choose a level of difficulty and attempt to give the correct answers to ten sums before receiving a score.

127333.name: ShootersPool - Billiards Simulation
127333.summary:
ShootersPool is an online billiards simulator for Windows PC, developed for the most demanding Pool, Snooker and Carom players. 
 
Its advanced physics engine provide the players the possibility of face each game as they would in the real game where the strategy and cue ball control is essential. The game features virtual recreations of real billiards brands and products to offer you the most faithful simulation. 
 
If you love to play Pool, Snooker or Carom, this is your game.

1546.name: Virtua Fighter PC
1546.summary: Fight the best martial arts masters with over 700 precision moves! Unleash hair-trigger punch/kick combos, throws and crushing stomps! Each warrior has a personal fighting style, attack strength and special moves. Rapid, realistic 360-degree combat with 3D polygon graphics. See the fighters from all sides! Fluid animations look just like real fighters. Get totally wrapped up in the action!

100342.name: Yummy Cubes
100342.summary: Enjoy addictive yummy puzzles for FREE! Challenge yourself and beat levels NOW!

68433.name: Sudoku X
68433.summary: Sudoku X is an XNA community game

155967.name: Immunity Tales
155967.summary: The tale of a group of immune cells around the body full of fights against several micro-organisms, challenges and puzzles will keep you glued to the screen until the end of the game.

123935.name: Let's Go! Skiing
123935.summary: “Let's go! Skiing VR”- go skiing to the finish line as a professional athlete! Easy-to-understand gameplay and great graphics will give an ocean of emotions to adults and children!

115347.name: Buoyancy
115347.summary: Buoyancy is a city-building strategy game where you build, manage, and move a floating city on an oceanic world. Explore and scavenge resources scattered around the endless waters. Keep your villagers nourished and happy while combating fires, sickness, and pirate attacks.

84084.name: President Trump The Way In Uganda
84084.summary: Once President Trump learned about an ancient country in which in the streets are lying bitcoins and drugs, this country called Uganda. Trump went on the road for the bitcoins, but he did not suspect that dangerous animals were waiting for him in Uganda...

47837.name: The Soukou Kihei Gun Ground
47837.summary:
Pilot a fully customizable mech suit in this side scrolling action game. You can swap parts and add upgrades to make your mech suit unique to you! 
 
This game features random level generation and a branching story that makes for tons of replay value! You'll never play through the same game twice! 
 
There is also a multiplayer versus mode in which up to 4 players can connect wirelessly and battle it out using just one cartridge! 
 
This game is a must own for any fans of the Mobile Suit Gundam series or any other mech related games or anime

89289.name: Daddy Long Legs
89289.summary:
Take “control” of a little, hairy creature. Put one leg in front of the other and try not to fall. 
 
Now you can play as either Daddy or his horse, and unlock costumes that makes walking look fabulous!

183684.name: Launch Party
183684.summary: A competitive multiplayer space flight experience, played over a Twitch stream.

131636.name: JekoosWare
131636.summary: This is a mini-game collection based on Jekoos. Relive the classic full-motion video game about your favorite aliens! Try to escape falling llamas, or avoid flying birds in the sky as Super Jekoos and more! (Now with a multiplayer mode!

111058.name: Super Cats
111058.summary:
Time to fight! Do you want to become a super hero? 
Supercats - a new recreational real-time competitive mobile game with so many cool anthropomorphic cats.

29021.name: Battleship Bishojo
29021.summary: Join the girls on a non-stop naval adventure to unravel the secrets of both the legendary creatures and the truth about the world inhabited by the battleship Bishojo! You can expect swashbuckling action, twists, ecchi humour and - of course - plenty of fanservice!

30946.name: Slingshot people
30946.summary: It's fun to shoot people with a slingshot, but beware, they are armed and dangerous!

35671.name: STATIC: Investigator Training
35671.summary: Assume the role of Julie Masters, a new Berkshire Paranormal investigator as she explores and investigates the Houghton Mansion using all the ghost-hunting tools of the trade!

100529.name: Light Cube
100529.summary: Light Cube - At first glance, a simple platformer, but after a couple of levels it turns out that there are heavy rooms, and even total darkness, the task is not simple..

122002.name: Trucker's Dynasty - Cuba Libre
122002.summary: Start your own family and lead them into a secure future in Trucker's Dynasty: Cuba Libre.

70735.name: Jerusalem: The Three Roads to the Holy Land
70735.summary:
Jerusalem: The Three Roads to the Holy Land is a 2002 historical adventure game. It is a sequel to the game Pompei: The Legend of Vesuvius. 
 
When a Scottish cartographer by the name of Adrien Blake returns from an expedition he discovers that his fiancée, Sophia, has disappeared. He must travel to Jerusalem to search for her. The story unfolds in the year 1552.

86712.name: Touch Pong
86712.summary: Pong is one of the classic games that never dies, it just gets reborn into different forms. Control your paddle with the touch bar, or for less fun, with the arrow keys.

17097.name: Infinity Runner
17097.summary: The Infinity is the largest spaceship ever built by man-kind; flung into the void of space to secure humanity a new home amongst the stars. However, instead of discovering paradise, the inhabitants of The Infinity unlocked the door to a long forgotten nightmare.

105602.name: Juan v Juan
105602.summary: Juan v Juan is a 1-versus-1 online shooter inspired by the games of yesteryear. Pick your character, customize your abilities, and face off against your opponent to become the last Juan standing.

143942.name: Bunny Quest
143942.summary: Help desperate daddy bunny fix an Easter mess in the match3 game "Bunny Quest"! Enjoy over 90 Match-3 levels and loads of cute mini games!

69464.name: Chinese Professional Baseball League CPBL
69464.summary: This is a 1v1 baseball game that's playable on mobile devices, produced by Gong Games.

123926.name: Kendo
123926.summary: Kendo is a room-scale VR Kendo Training Application.

192501.name: Manacircle
192501.summary: Manacircle is a combat adventure game about exploring the deep unknown and solve the problem in a way. Unique characters and strong enemies will test your skill. The journey to find the true meaning of Manacircle has begin!

57163.name: F.A.C.E.S.
57163.summary: F.A.C.E.S. is a horror and hidden object game.

119898.name: Brutal Games
119898.summary: Brutal Games is a first-person shooter in which you have only one task - the last to stay alive! You start the game without any means of protection, and therefore you need as soon as possible to get yourself weapons and ammunition that are scattered around the level.

144829.name: Campaign Eylau-Friedland
144829.summary: Campaign Eylau-Friedland recreates the battles of the campaign in Poland of 1806-07. These were fought initially in the frozen countryside of Poland and East Prussia during the winter months of December through February and in the spring of 1807 at the end of which the French and their allies emerged victorious. Now you can take control of either the French or Allied armies and refight the famous battles which decided the fate of the Fourth Coalition and brought about the birth of the Grand Duchy of Warsaw and saw the Allies foiled once again by Napoleon.

53021.name: Fantasy Grounds: Call of Cthulhu - The House of R'lyeh
53021.summary: Five Scenarios Based on H.P. Lovecraft Tales converted for play on the Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop.By David Conyers, Glyn White, Brian Courtemanche, Peter Gilham, and Brian M. Sammons.

35504.name: Major Stryker
35504.summary:
In the not-so-distant future, the calamity of World War III led to eventual world peace. But, it didn't last. Earth was invaded by alien marauders - the Kretons. Earth's united military force, still depleted after the mighty onslaught of WWIII, was not nearly sufficient to repel the numerous Kreton attacks. 
 
It was discovered that the Kretons had used a wormhole to invade our region of space from their home worlds. And with that knowledge Earth called into action Major Harrison Stryker, hero of WWIII, to travel back through the wormhole and destroy the Kreton's home world headquarters. 
 
With almost no chance of success, you accept the mission...

52170.name: Ecolibrium
52170.summary: A free-to-play Sci-Fi ecology simulator for PlayStation Vita. Controls a virtual ecosystem in which to grow and care for flora and fauna by manipulating four variables - Water, Minerals, Vegetation, and Meat - in order to create a balanced ecosystem.

63815.name: Lock on: Flaming Cliffs 3
63815.summary: The third installment of the realistic Lock On series, as a DCS World module.

77736.name: Grand Prix Story 2
77736.summary: Kairosoft's second racing team management game.

143583.name: Steel Graves
143583.summary: Steel Graves is a third person action-strategy game in solo and multiplayer. Take place in the conflict between the corporation Neoterra and the aliens from the planet Tartare. Fight on the battlefield, seize the resources and annihilate your enemy.

142804.name: Obsolete
142804.summary: Obsolete is a short 2D platformer with a calm atmosphere in a very strange world where everything is deteriorating quickly. Cross the abandoned caves of this fallen world in search of an answer.

43143.name: Dashing Nineties: R.M.D.
43143.summary: Alternative Russia in 90's from Dashing Nineties: R.M.D. looks just like real. With one exception: there is less violence by the way. But the country still have a bad time: the Soviet Union has just collapsed and people finally get the freedom the wanted for so long.

93530.name: If I Were in a Sealed Room With a Girl, I'd Probably XXX

143953.name: Wall Jump Stuff
143953.summary: Physics based arcade wall jumping game - Wall jump up an endless cliff, clear obstacles, catch gems, unlock quirky characters and fill your boat!

29432.name: TANKOUT
29432.summary: TANKOUT your friends and enemies in this crazy online creative tank battle game! Collect coins to buy blocks to build your own battle arenas! This game is INSANE! Try building a map while tanks are shooting at you. Welcome to CHALLENGEVILLE population: YOU! Build. Battle. BERSERK!

74771.name: Once Upon a Puppet
74771.summary: Once Upon a Puppet is a side-scrolling puzzle platformer developed by Flatter Than Earth.

40430.name: Super Chase: Criminal Termination
40430.summary: Once again you control a police car that must clear enemy fire and find the target car within the time limit.

78091.name: Touchdown
78091.summary: Touchdown is a football themed pinball machine.

163335.name: Ultimate Sudoku Collection: Even Odd Pack

132761.name: Land of Zympaia
132761.summary: You start as a homeless person in the world, alone and with nothing in hand you have to work your way up to survive.

105939.name: Trax - Build it Race it
105939.summary: Speed through stunning 3D tracks you created and discover the magic of Trax!

78358.name: CityBattle: Virtual Earth
78358.summary: MMO F2P shooter using Unreal Engine 4.

67281.name: Crimson Room: Reverse
67281.summary: Crimson Room: Reverse's premise is that the player finds themselves trapped in a single room. Controlling a cursor that can click on items to search and investigate, it's up to the player to scan the environment for helpful objects and figure out how to use them. The ultimate goal is unlocking an exit door and earning freedom.

126785.name: The Adventures of Looppy
126785.summary: Immerse yourself in the magical world of adventure and puzzles with Looppy!

183682.name: Znax
183682.summary: A Match same tiles puzzle game with 2 gameplay modes and skin support

53511.name: Risen 2: Dark Waters - A Pirate's Clothes

127050.name: Contract Killer: Zombies
127050.summary: You have killed more criminals than you can count. Now it’s time to face the apocalypse and blow the crap out of thousands of zombies! From the team that brought you Contract Killer comes CONTRACT KILLER: ZOMBIES.

101391.name: Mystery USA! - Fun Seek and Find Hidden Object Puzzles

105429.name: I saw IT
105429.summary: The town of Lerry have been haunted by evil creatures for over a hundred years. After years of investigating. Detective Q finally encounter the evil shapeshifting monster and begins their first conflict...

1226.name: Kingdom Hearts 3D: Dream Drop Distance
1226.summary:
Kingdom Hearts 3D: Dream Drop Distance is the seventh game in the Kingdom Hearts series. It was originally developed for the Nintendo 3DS hand-held system. It is a direct sequel to Kingdom Hearts II, Kingdom Hearts coded, and the epilogue of Kingdom Hearts Birth by Sleep.

Utilizing the 3DS's high-spec graphics processing, the game's graphics are near on-par with those of the PS2 titles, and make use of the system's 3D technology to add immersion when falling from high places and flying far distances. The 3D effect is used more for "going into the screen" rather than things popping out.

125539.name: Catadel
125539.summary: Catadel is a colony management simulation game - with cats! Manage your cat citizens' wants, needs, and quirky personalities as you help them build a settlement in the wilderness.

9897.name: Baseball Simulator 1.000
9897.summary: Baseball Simulator 1.000 was made by Culture Brain exclusively for the Nintendo Entertainment System. Released in 1989, it was praised by Electronic Gaming Monthly as the "Best Sports-Themed Video Game" of 1989. This was largely due to some unique gameplay features that helped it to set itself apart from the many other baseball games released.

171506.name: Hacker Evolution Duality: Inception Part 3
171506.summary: Extend your gaming experience with 10 new levels contained in this new DLC. The INCEPTION series is going back to the roots of the Hacker Evolution games. The levels from the original Hacker Evolution Untold game have been remastered for the new Hacker Evolution Duality engine.

127520.name: Crazy Ball Racing
127520.summary: Crazy Ball Racing is a game that takes the rush of a race and the skill of a platformer, and combines it with the intensity of a massively multiplayer experience.

43035.name: Worm's Crazy Golf
43035.summary: Worms Crazy Golf is a 2011 action game developed by Team17. A sequel to the mobile exclusive "Worms Golf", the game uses the basic framework of the "Worms" series as the foundation for a 2D golf title.

48190.name: Over Horizon
48190.summary: Over Horizon is a Shoot-'Em-Up game, developed by Pixel and published by Hot-B, which was released in Europe in 1991.

100935.name: Ninja Toy Warrior - Legendary Ninja Fight

42136.name: Mission Attack
42136.summary: Japanese Tomy Pyuuta title, part number 009E, released in 1982.

88093.name: Last Empire – War Z: Strategy
88093.summary:
Battle other survivors from around the world and train your own zombie army in Last Empire – War Z, the base-building war game! Defend your empire as the walking dead roam the streets and the apocalypse alliance tries to destroy your empire. Survive the zombie apocalypse in Last Empire - War Z and develop your empire with allied survivors to slaughter zombie troops. Can you be the strongest survivor of them all?

Last Empire - War Z is a zombie apocalypse-themed survivor game. Battle against zombies and other survivors to build your empire and army. Team up with allies from around the world to fight enemies, defend against the walking dead and participate in online events. Gather resources to support your army and grow your empire in Last Empire - War Z!

Last Empire - War Z Features:

End of the World Survivor Games
*Play survivor games with other players online!
*View zombie battles on the world map in real-time and chat with alliance members worldwide!
*Fight an army of the walking dead and other survivors to expand your empire!

Build an Army of Survivors
*Zombie Troops: Train deadly zombie troops as part of your army to destroy enemies!
*Improve your army and recruit Officers with unique survival skills and abilities!
*Use the Varied Skill Trees and develop your army to fit your play style!

Take on the Zombie Apocalypse Online 
*In-game events offer constant challenges and great rewards!
*Work together to achieve powerful bonuses in survivor alliance activities!
*Participate in base-building strategy games and use new technology to fight the walking dead!

Destroy zombies, clash with other survivors or join a powerful alliance as you struggle to survive the zombie apocalypse in the world of Last Empire - War Z!


Download today and take part in the zombie war!

137136.name: Rogue Summoner
137136.summary: Rogue Summoner is a turn-based tactics roguelike about strategically conjuring monsters to fight in your stead. Summon every creature you encounter, from spineless minions to mighty bosses, and conquer all the dungeons to become the Rogue Summoner.

57391.name: Major\Minor
57391.summary: Visual Novel game about a wave of murders that sweep across a city.

150693.name: Human vs Monster
150693.summary: "Human vs Monster" is a tower defense game similar to Plants vs. Zombies. You need to use humans reasonably to deal with monsters with different characteristics. There are at most five levels for each human or monster, which are-common, advanced, legend, antiquity, and creation.

105842.name: Robots Vs Zombies: Transform To Race And Fight

134484.name: YellowDream
134484.summary: YellowDream is a 2D rpg platformer game about someone lucid dreaming and making the decisions they want, going where they want but at the same time fighting nightmares in order to not fall in fear. The game got a gorgeous soundtrack and graphics that will make you fall in love with.

183692.name: Feeder
183692.summary: You either feed or get sniffed/blinded/deafened and eaten!

130902.name: SKYE
130902.summary: SKYE is a relaxing explorative game where you venture into a world inspired by the Western Isles. Fly around the captivating islands, help the locals with their troubles, and set the fastest time in races while absorbing everything around you through the painterly environment.

15760.name: Quake: Mission Pack 1 - Scourge of Armagon
15760.summary: After defeating Shub-Niggurath, you arrive back at your home base on Earth, but it's not all blue skies and butterflies. Apparently, not all QUAKE forces have been subdued. Chaos ensues as you blast your way through the QUAKE minions and toward the infested gateway. Your only choice is to find the source of evil and shut it down. Without any hesitation, and with more guts than common sense, you leap into a portal of unknown destination.

157654.name: The Tower Of TigerQiuQiu: Bomber Tiger
157654.summary: About: Bomber Tiger：A Tiger put bomber to destroy all the enemy ，find a door to escape the Maze. The DLC have full 10 mission

134622.name: Honey Select 2: Libido
134622.summary: Honey Select 2 Libido is a 3D eroge created by the Japanese H-game company Illusion. Though it's a successor to Honey Select gameplay-wise, on the technical side it shares many similarities and is cross-compatible with AI Shoujo.

183688.name: Laserface
183688.summary: Blow up a city with your face lasers!

183673.name: Foul Airs
183673.summary: Manage your kingdom during a plague in this brief simulator for HyperCard.

69980.name: Arcade Archives: Crazy Climber 2
69980.summary: Crazy Climber 2 is an action game released by Nichibutsu in 1988. It was a well-received sequel to the popular first installment in the Crazy Climber franchise. This time the game takes place in America, with even better traps and troublemakers standing in your way as you climb up the building.

183991.name: Underswap: Nuts in Bolts Don't Actually
183991.summary: A visual novel centered around the player romancing DJ Blook and Metta from the Undertale AU: Underswap.

121798.name: Heroes Swipe Right
121798.summary: Heroes Swipe Right is a challenging dungeon crawler where you form your party of adventurers using a dating app, swiping left to pass on the losers and right to pair with capable allies. Every potential match comes with their strengths and quirks, many of which drastically alter the nature of the game.

192502.name: Endlanders
192502.summary: Build your deck, glitch through enemies, translate unknown languages and decipher the mysteries of this universe, in this grid-based real time combat indie game. Endlanders features two main characters with diverging storylines in the same universe, fighting their way through unknown planes.

176327.name: Farm Alarm
176327.summary: Mr. Peanut and his brother Mr. Pickle is taking over the farmily business. Will you and a friend help them succeed?

94165.name: Guru Guru
94165.summary: Guru Guru is an action game featuring apprentices and their familiars which must be thrown across hazardous courses to reach a goal at the end. Players must strategize and alchemize the perfect familiars to overcome each obstacle course. The gameplay could be described as side-scrolling golf.

18805.name: Neptune
18805.summary: Neptune is a side scrolling arcade game where the player controls a submarine while destroying or avoiding underwater sea creatures.

183690.name: Deify
183690.summary: "In another time, in another place, I Will Ascend."

149650.name: Daffodil Yellow: A Few Poems From an Insect Collector
149650.summary: You are an insect collector looking for colors in old summer memories...

25789.name: Don't open the doors!
25789.summary:
"Don't open the doors!" is a claymation action adventure in an odd world of talking pumpkins, blue trees and stuff like that.

The city is in danger! The doors came out of nowhere. Everything near them began to talk and almost everything tried to eat you. Solving this problem is no sweat: you only have to find the Main super door and blast it with a super Megabomb. As a real hero, you will have to handle it yourself. However, everything is sure to go haywire!

118470.name: Abandoned Snowy Castle
118470.summary: You are traveling to England with your little sister during the summer holiday. But what comes is...

6024.name: Benefactor
6024.summary: After two hugely successful pinball games, DICE ventured into new territory with the Amiga game Benefactor. In this cutesy puzzle platformer, you play the character Ben E. Factor, who has resigned from the military to become an all-around good guy. Factor’s mission is to save a group of “Merry Men” who have been kidnapped from their home planet and imprisoned over 60 tricky levels. The player has to carefully navigate through the puzzle levels and release the Merry Men in the correct order so they can help rescue the rest of the prisoners.

88801.name: Misa!
88801.summary: MISA is a relaxing, addictive and deceptively simple puzzle game. Draw a path that will get you through a landscape of everchanging geometry. Grab diamonds along the way. Reach the goal. Make your own path.

6435.name: High Heat Major League Baseball 2003
6435.summary: High Heat Major League Baseball 2003 was the second-to-last of a series of baseball computer games, released on PlayStation 2, PC, and Game Boy Advance. The game, featuring the official licensed team and player names from all 30 MLB teams, was created by games company 3DO, who later filed for bankruptcy in May 2003.[4

127792.name: Man Of The House
127792.summary: Man of the House is an adult game, in which you play a young man living in a city full of beautiful women. Experience around 30-40 hours of content, in this sandbox VN, filled with steamy sex scenes, amusing dialogs and some very unexpected plot twists.

27838.name: Sam & Max: Beyond Time and Space - Episode 4: Chariots of the Dogs
27838.summary: Boscos vanished from the face of the Earthliterally! When Sam & Max manage to track him down, what they find is so mind boggling, you'll have to see it to believe it. Can the Freelance Police set things right, or will life as they know it fall victim to the capricious whims of T-H-E-M?

181900.name: Wwaves
181900.summary: Survive the WWAVES. Beat the boss. Save the world.

143574.name: Planet Crafter
143574.summary: You are sent on an hostile planet with one mission: Make it habitable for Humans. You'll have to survive, collect ressources, build your base and machines in order to heat the planet, create an atmosphere with oxygen and eventually geo-engineer an entire planet.

99815.name: Hitman: Contracts HD
99815.summary: Get Hitman: Contracts HD, Action game for PS3 console from the official PlayStation® website. Know more about Hitman: Contracts HD Game.

71815.name: Quattro Skills
71815.summary: Quattro Skills is a game that includes 4 Codemasters classics.

186715.name: Dragoncrest RPG: Arc 1
186715.summary: Adventures await you in the lands of the Dragoncrest Empire. Set out in search of fame, fortune and mastery of the many adventurer skills in this Zero-to-Hero Adventure RPG series! Brought to you by a team of fellow gaming enthusiasts with a passion for the RPG Genre and playing Dungeons & Dragons. The games in this series are designed like playable volumes of a Light Novel written in the expandable story style of a D&D Campaign.

128673.name: The Straw Man in the Wicker House

44470.name: Colin McRae Rally 2005 Plus
44470.summary:
Colin McRae Rally 2005 plus is coming to the PSP. Featuring over 30 rally cars, a diverse range of rally events, cups and championships to create a world of rallying for players on the move. 
 
With a variety of gaming modes, including 4WD Championship, Career and Multiplayer modes over the PSP's wireless network, Colin McRae Rally 2005 will offer the perfect mobile rallying experience.

101386.name: Super B-Dino's adventures
101386.summary: Super B-Dino's adventures - A game about the dinosaur Dino - a small dragon. Help Dino overcome all the challenges and climb as high as possible.

192460.name: Furry Hentai Quest
192460.summary: The world of Klytoria is in danger! Will you be able to make it far away enough from the castle? Using your choice of Hentai, Furry, or human characters you must eschew obstacles and carefully navigate the lands... Can you save Klytoria?

192506.name: Sweet Hero
192506.summary: Help our hero Coconut little kiss to defeat all enemies and the evil King in the Sweet Kingdom , to bring back the peace. Face different candy themed enemies in challengings stages with grid based movement mechanics.

97348.name: GirlJail
97348.summary:
AD. 2666: The efficacious cyberjudge condemns and executes irredeemable criminals. Your time has come. 
 
The average play time for this bullet-hell minigame is 3 minutes. 
 
Created by Australian artists Lachlan Cartland and Alexander Ocias over the course of a 48 hour game jam, featuring music by sintecta.

192456.name: Just Ignore Them: Brea's Story Tape 1
192456.summary: On her way to cover the biggest story of her career, Brea Tena fumbles her way into a dark mysterious town called Ash Pines, the birthplace of the tragic events that took place in Just Ignore Them.

47362.name: Ultimate Pro Pinball
47362.summary: Ultimate Pro Pinball contains three different pinball games in one package.

192511.name: Fear Of The Darkness
192511.summary: Fear Of The Darkness is a narrative psychologic game that will push you to face the phobias of some patients. Through different game phases you will look for Brightness. Be careful not to get overwhelmed by their emotional burden, step out of the Darkness and explore the various corners of Truth.

64964.name: Battle Gear 4
64964.summary: An arcade racing game by Taito.

74146.name: Puella Magi Madoka Magica TPS featuring Sayaka Miki and Kyoko Sakura
74146.summary: A third person shooter featuring Kyoko Sakura and Sayaka Miki of the anime series, Puella Magi Madoka Magica.

183702.name: Chicken Butt
183702.summary: Help Mayo the chicken get to space so he can finally fly

60954.name: PaddleSpace
60954.summary: PaddleSpace is a retro-80's inspired mash-up of 'Pong', 'Asteroids', and 'Galaga' to be released in 2014 after ten years in on-again/off-again development.

96146.name: Ather
96146.summary:
Ather is a Psychological Indie Horror Game By LazyMonks Entertainment, You Play As Felix a youtuber and a haunted explorer who recieves an email about a haunted cabin in the woods. As soon as he enters the woods he finds something weird about this place. 
 
Ather is not just another game about Jumpscares and Scary ambiences but is backed by a powerful story. it is designed using real world terrain and high quality graphics. The game will attempt to make you feel many kinds of horrors, including those of phobias, the feeling of being watched, of being chased. it is a strange intermixing of reality and night terrors... 
 
You will have to figure out ways to overcome obstacles and also venture into the deepest darkness in order to advance, it emphasizes puzzle-solving and evasive action, rather than violence.

86689.name: Blackjack Master
86689.summary:
NO ADS, nothing else to buy, unlimited money supply.
Play up to 3 hands at once, or compete against others
User-adjustable chart showing correct plays
Be notified of the correct play, or turn that feature off.
Complete player stats available during the game
Optional card counting feature to improve your skill
Handles multiple splits, doubles, insurance
Auto-play up to 10k hands and try out different strategies
Control Casino Rules and Player Rules with preferences
Optional Music and Sound Effects
Play with or without Insurance as an option
Use mouse or keyboard input

176319.name: Ducklings
176319.summary: Quack, you're a duck. Swim around and rescue Ducklings. Upgrade your nest. Relax

99802.name: Jetpack Joyride Deluxe
99802.summary: Join Barry Steakfries as he breaks in to a secret laboratory to commandeer the experimental jetpacks from the clutches of science evildoers. Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV

81432.name: All Star Soccer
81432.summary: A Football game developed and published by Eidos Interactive, released for the PlayStation in 1997.

63832.name: KOF X Garou Densetsu
63832.summary: KOF X Garou Densetsu is a card game featuring characters from the Fatal Fury and The King of Fighters series.

31668.name: Hyper color ball
31668.summary: Hyper color ball is a casual, difficult game. The game-play mechanics are based on testing your focus and dexterity skills. With a fast paced, upbeat soundtrack and a strong vibrant colours. Hyper color ball makes for a fantastic party game.

98587.name: Xenogunner
98587.summary: Blast your way past a large variety of bosses, from an imposing robot dragon to a fierce mercenary in a flying car, and save the universe from the evil Xenogunner in this intense boss-focused run-and-gun platformer!

188922.name: Wreckdigger
188922.summary: Dive into a short story about stranded rebel fighting for his survival on a foreign mysterious planet which is a spaceship graveyard. Encounter scavengers fighting for valuable ship parts. Meet other survivors -help others to help yourself. An action platformer with metroidvania elements.

117647.name: Rogue Slash
117647.summary: Rogue Slash is a combination of original roguelike rules with isometric hack & slash gameplay .4 characters with a different playstyle, 8 levels and one rule - if you die then you start from the beginning.

176321.name: God Save The Queen
176321.summary: Deceive your friends with your slick spy moves.

66906.name: Tomb of the TaskMaker
66906.summary: Tomb of the TaskMaker is a sequel to Storm Impact's Macintosh RPG TaskMaker. It was released in 1997, and features a 2D RPG game-play style identical to its predecsssor.

102504.name: Toy Wars Gold Edition: The Story of Army Heroes

183689.name: Weightless
183689.summary: A meditative virtual reality experience about inspecting space debris in a weightless environment.

85173.name: HullBreach: Uncloaked
85173.summary: An updated version of Wii Browser MMORPG HullBreach Online.

183704.name: Beaks of Rage
183704.summary: An RPG beat-em-up about a regular chicken.

176318.name: Trail Mix
176318.summary: Cooperate with a friend, foe, or lover to solve mind bending puzzles!

164358.name: Dungeon Defenders: President's Day Surprise

2850.name: Aidyn Chronicles: The First Mage

Along his journey, Alaron has had the fortune of meeting up with a party of others that are looking for adventure. You can choose to play as any of 13 characters. A more or less traditional role-playing game, AIDYN CHRONICLES: The First Mage is a brilliant mix of interaction, fighting, and extensive exploration. All of the battles take place in an innovative turn-based system, challenging you to handle both combat and real-time strategy. All of the characters and environments in the game are rendered in full 3D, and the characters have complete freedom in their ranges of movement. There's more territory in the game's expanses than you'll ever get a chance to see, and the sheer diversity of the character types is really impressive. If you like role-playing games, you'll want to check out this installment of Aidyn Chronicles.

VoxStory remains true to the tabletop style of gaming, the roll of the dice determines your actions, the Gamemaster will still set the story, atmosphere and scene, but with VoxStory you won’t just have to imagine it, you’ll be able to watch it like your very own movie.

With world creation, the possibilities are endless, you can customise every aspect of your world or use a pre-populated world if you’re short of time. Players can join your world with their own custom characters, gather round, connect to a large screen, such as a TV, and watch your adventure play out.

Battlefront II, however, includes elements and missions from Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith, as well as enhanced aspects of gameplay including space combat and the ability to play as Jedi characters or other heroes.

With brand new space combat, playable Jedi characters, and over 16 all new battlefronts, Star Wars Battlefront II gives you more ways than ever before to play the classic Star Wars battles any way you want.

136134.name: Double Dragon II
136134.summary:
Double dragon II is a side-scrolling developed and released for the Game Boy and unrelated to Double Dragon II: The Revenge.
The player takes control of martial artist Billy Lee, who is being hunted down by an organization called the "Scorpions" for murdering one of its members. The objective of the game is to fight off the members of the Scorpions and confront the true culprit, a rival martial artist named Anderson. A second player can now join in anytime via the use of a Game Link Cable, taking control of Billy's brother, Jimmy.

The combat system is simpler compared to previous Double Dragon games, including the first Game Boy game. The player can perform a series of punches or a kick on most enemies, followed by straight punch or a high kick that knocks the enemy to the floor. Pressing the A and B buttons simultaneously will cause the player to kneel. While kneeling, pressing either button will cause the player to perform an aerial uppercut. Instead of the hair grab from previous games, the player will do a collar grab (similar to Renegade), in which the player can repeatedly punch his opponent in the face or push them to the ground. While standing near a fallen enemy, a jumping knee drop can be performed. Despite the presence of armed enemies, the player cannot disarm them and pick up their weapons like in other games in the series.

The game is composed of three missions, spread across ten stages. The first two missions each consist of four stages that follows a basic structure: the player fight their way through a street until reaching the boss. This is followed by a subway platform, a fight inside a subway car, and the destination platform, where the player confronts another boss. The final mission, composed of only two stages, starts at the streets again, but this time the player must fight his way to the entrance of the Scorpions headquarters. Once inside the building, the player fight their way through a series of floors, including an area where all the previous bosses appear, until reaching the top floor where Anderson awaits. The game has three difficulty settings, but the Easy setting only allows the first mission to be played.
